  39+ 940D              ;   VK_ENTER   VK_L,       VK_K,         VK_J,          VK_H,       VK_SPACE    VK_SYM,     VK_M,       VK_N,       VK_B
  40+ 940D              ;              Launch                    Distance       Hyperspace  Laser                               DockComp    BuyCargo
  41+ 940D              ;              ResumeGame
  42+ 940D
  43+ 940D              ; You can read address to check keystate by address KeyboardMap + c_Pressed corresponding key. There is also an addr_ helper too
  44+ 940D
  45+ 940D              c_Pressed_Front         equ 0  * 2
  46+ 940D              c_Pressed_Aft           equ 1  * 2
  47+ 940D              c_Pressed_Left          equ 2  * 2
  48+ 940D              c_Pressed_Right         equ 3  * 2
  49+ 940D              c_Pressed_RollLeft      equ 4  * 2
  50+ 940D              c_Pressed_RollRight     equ 5  * 2
  51+ 940D              c_Pressed_Dive          equ 6  * 2
  52+ 940D              c_Pressed_Climb         equ 7  * 2
  53+ 940D              c_Pressed_Accellerate   equ 8  * 2
  54+ 940D              c_Pressed_Decellerate   equ 9  * 2
  55+ 940D              c_Pressed_FireLaser     equ 10 * 2
  56+ 940D              c_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ 11 * 2
  57+ 940D              c_Pressed_FireMissile   equ 12 * 2
  58+ 940D              c_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ 13 * 2
  59+ 940D              c_Pressed_ECM           equ 14 * 2
  60+ 940D              c_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ 15 * 2
  61+ 940D              c_Pressed_EscapePod     equ 16 * 2
  62+ 940D              c_Pressed_DockingComp   equ 17 * 2
  63+ 940D              c_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ 18 * 2
  64+ 940D              c_Pressed_Distance      equ 19 * 2
  65+ 940D              c_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ 20 * 2
  66+ 940D              c_Pressed_Launch        equ 21 * 2
  67+ 940D              c_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ 22 * 2
  68+ 940D              c_Pressed_SellCargo     equ 23 * 2
  69+ 940D              c_Pressed_Equip         equ 24 * 2
  70+ 940D              c_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ 25 * 2
  71+ 940D              c_Pressed_LocalChart    equ 26 * 2
  72+ 940D              c_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ 27 * 2
  73+ 940D              c_Pressed_Status        equ 28 * 2
  74+ 940D              c_Pressed_Inventory     equ 29 * 2
  75+ 940D              c_Pressed_GameSkip      equ 30 * 2
  76+ 940D              c_Pressed_Save          equ 31 * 2
  77+ 940D              c_Pressed_Freeze        equ 32 * 2
  78+ 940D              c_Pressed_Resume        equ 33 * 2
  79+ 940D              c_Pressed_Recentre      equ 34 * 2
  80+ 940D              c_Pressed_Quit          equ 35 * 2
  81+ 940D              c_Pressed_PlanetData    equ 36 * 2
  82+ 940D              c_Pressed_CursorUp      equ 37 * 2
  83+ 940D              c_Pressed_CursorDown    equ 38 * 2
  84+ 940D              c_Pressed_Find          equ 39 * 2
  85+ 940D
  86+ 940D              ; half row 1
  87+ 940D              VK_CAPS  				equ 0
  88+ 940D              VK_Z  					equ 1
  89+ 940D              VK_X  					equ 2
  90+ 940D              VK_C  					equ 3
  91+ 940D              VK_V  					equ 4
  92+ 940D              ; half row 2
  93+ 940D              VK_A  					equ 5
  94+ 940D              VK_S  					equ 6
  95+ 940D              VK_D  					equ 7
  96+ 940D              VK_F  					equ 8
  97+ 940D              VK_G  					equ 9
  98+ 940D              ; half row 3
  99+ 940D              VK_Q  					equ 10
 100+ 940D              VK_W  					equ 11
 101+ 940D              VK_E  					equ 12
 102+ 940D              VK_R  					equ 13
 103+ 940D              VK_T  					equ 14
 104+ 940D              ; half row 4
 105+ 940D              VK_1  					equ 15
 106+ 940D              VK_2  					equ 16
 107+ 940D              VK_3  					equ 17
 108+ 940D              VK_4  					equ 18
 109+ 940D              VK_5  					equ 19
 110+ 940D              ; half row 5
 111+ 940D              VK_0 					equ 20
 112+ 940D              VK_9 					equ 21
 113+ 940D              VK_8 					equ 22
 114+ 940D              VK_7 					equ 23
 115+ 940D              VK_6 					equ 24
 116+ 940D              ; half row 6
 117+ 940D              VK_P  					equ 25
 118+ 940D              VK_O  					equ 26
 119+ 940D              VK_I  					equ 27
 120+ 940D              VK_U  					equ 28
 121+ 940D              VK_Y  					equ 29
 122+ 940D              ; half row 7
 123+ 940D              VK_ENTER 				equ 30
 124+ 940D              VK_L  					equ 31
 125+ 940D              VK_K  					equ 32
 126+ 940D              VK_J  					equ 33
 127+ 940D              VK_H  					equ 34
 128+ 940D              ; half row 8
 129+ 940D              VK_SPACE 				equ 35
 130+ 940D              VK_SYM  				equ 36
 131+ 940D              VK_M  					equ 37
 132+ 940D              VK_N  					equ 38
 133+ 940D              VK_B  					equ 39
 134+ 940D
 135+ 940D              ;KeyboardMapping
 136+ 940D              KeyCode_Front        	equ VK_1
 137+ 940D              KeyCode_Aft          	equ VK_2
 138+ 940D              KeyCode_Left         	equ VK_3
 139+ 940D              KeyCode_Right        	equ VK_4
 140+ 940D              KeyCode_RollLeft     	equ VK_O
 141+ 940D              KeyCode_RollRight    	equ VK_P
 142+ 940D              KeyCode_Dive         	equ VK_Q
 143+ 940D              KeyCode_Climb        	equ VK_A
 144+ 940D              KeyCode_Accellerate  	equ VK_W
 145+ 940D              KeyCode_Decellerate  	equ VK_S
 146+ 940D              KeyCode_FireLaser    	equ VK_SPACE
 147+ 940D              KeyCode_TargetMissle 	equ VK_T
 148+ 940D              KeyCode_FireMissile  	equ VK_F
 149+ 940D              KeyCode_Find        	equ VK_F
 150+ 940D              KeyCode_UnarmMissile 	equ VK_R
 151+ 940D              KeyCode_ECM          	equ VK_E
 152+ 940D              KeyCode_EnergyBomb   	equ VK_U
 153+ 940D              KeyCode_EscapePod    	equ VK_CAPS
 154+ 940D              KeyCode_DockingComp  	equ VK_N
 155+ 940D              KeyCode_Hyperspace   	equ VK_H
 156+ 940D              KeyCode_Distance     	equ VK_J
 157+ 940D              KeyCode_HomeCursor   	equ VK_G
 158+ 940D              KeyCode_Launch       	equ VK_L
 159+ 940D              KeyCode_BuyCargo     	equ VK_B
 160+ 940D              KeyCode_SellCargo    	equ VK_V
 161+ 940D              KeyCode_Equip        	equ VK_C
 162+ 940D              KeyCode_GalacticChrt 	equ VK_5
 163+ 940D              KeyCode_LocalChart   	equ VK_6
 164+ 940D              KeyCode_MarketPrices 	equ VK_7
 165+ 940D              KeyCode_Status       	equ VK_8
 166+ 940D              KeyCode_Inventory    	equ VK_9
 167+ 940D              KeyCode_GameSkip     	equ VK_Z
 168+ 940D              KeyCode_Save         	equ VK_O
 169+ 940D              KeyCode_Freeze       	equ VK_B
 170+ 940D              KeyCode_Resume       	equ VK_L
 171+ 940D              KeyCode_Recentre     	equ VK_D
 172+ 940D              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 173+ 940D              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 174+ 940D              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 175+ 940D              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 176+ 940D
 177+ 940D 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40
 178+ 9435              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 9435 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 943D FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 9441 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 9445 FE EF FE DF
 180+ 9449 FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 944D              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 944D              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 944D              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 944D 1C 94 1D 94  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 9451 1E 94 1F 94
 184+ 9455 27 94
 185+ 9457 26 94 17 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 945B 12 94 18 94
 185+ 945F 13 94
 186+ 9461 30 94 1B 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 186+ 9465 15 94 1A 94
 186+ 9469 19 94
 187+ 946B 29 94 0D 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 187+ 946F 33 94 2F 94
 187+ 9473 2E 94
 188+ 9475 16 94 2C 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 188+ 9479 34 94 11 94
 188+ 947D 10 94
 189+ 947F 20 94 25 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 189+ 9483 24 94 23 94
 189+ 9487 22 94
 190+ 9489 0E 94 27 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 190+ 948D 34 94 2C 94
 190+ 9491 14 94
 191+ 9493 2A 94 21 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 191+ 9497 17 94 12 94
 191+ 949B 15 94
 192+ 949D
 193+ 949D 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 193+ 94A1 56
 194+ 94A2 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 194+ 94A6 47
 195+ 94A7 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 195+ 94AB 54
 196+ 94AC 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 196+ 94B0 35
 197+ 94B1 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 197+ 94B5 36
 198+ 94B6 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 198+ 94BA 59
 199+ 94BB 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 199+ 94BF 48
 200+ 94C0 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 200+ 94C4 42
 201+ 94C5
 202+ 94C5
 203+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 204+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 205+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 206+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 207+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 208+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 209+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 210+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 211+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 212+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 213+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 214+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 215+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 216+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 217+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 218+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 219+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 220+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 221+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 222+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 223+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 224+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 237+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 238+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 239+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 240+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 241+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 242+ 94C5              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 94C5
 244+ 94C5
 245+ 94C5              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 94C5 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 94C5 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 94C5 ~                                JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 249+ 94C5                                  ENDM
 250+ 94C5
 251+ 94C5 21 0D 94     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 94C8 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 94CB 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 94CD CD D2 93                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 94D0 C9                               ret
 256+ 94D1
 257+ 94D1 21 35 94     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 94D4 11 3D 94                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 94D7 AF                               xor		a
 260+ 94D8 FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 94DB DD 21 0D 94                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 94DF 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 94E0 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 94E1 13                               inc		de
 265+ 94E2 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 94E3 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 94E4 13                               inc		de
 268+ 94E5 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 94E7 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 94E8 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 94E9 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 94EB CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 94ED 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 94EF 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 94F0 AF                               xor     a
 276+ 94F1 C3 FD 94                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 94F4 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 94F6 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 94F7 DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 94FA 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 94FB E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 94FD DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 9500 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 9501 DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 9503 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 9505 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 9507 FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 9509 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 950B C9                               ret
 290+ 950C
 291+ 950C              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 950C ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 950C ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 950C ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 950C ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 950C ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 950C ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 950C ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 950C                                    ENDM
 300+ 950C
 301+ 950C
 302+ 950C              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 950C              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 950C 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 950F ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 9511 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 9512 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 9513 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 9514 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 9515 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9516 D5                                       push    de
 305+ 9517 CD D1 94     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 951A E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 951B E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 951C 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 951D                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 951D FE 01       >                        cp     1
 309+ 951F C2 17 95    >                        jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 9522 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 9523 C9                                       ret
 312+ 9524
 313+ 9524              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 9524 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 9527 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 9529 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 952A 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 952B 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 952C 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 952D 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 952E D5                                       push    de
 315+ 952F CD D1 94     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 9532 E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 9533 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 9534 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 9535                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 9535 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 9537 DA 2F 95    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 953A E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 953B C9                                       ret
 322+ 953C
 323+ 953C              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 953C 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 953F ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 9541 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 9542 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 9543 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 9544 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 9545 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 9546 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 9547 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 9548 C9                                       ret
 327+ 9549
 328+ 9549              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 9549 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 954C ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 954E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 954F 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 9550 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 9551 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 9552 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 9553 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 9554 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 9556 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 9557 C9                                       ret
 333+ 9558
 334+ 9558              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 9558              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 9558 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 955B ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 955D 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 955E 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 955F 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 9560 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9561 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 9562 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 9563 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 9564 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 9566 C9                                       ret
 340+ 9567
 341+ 9567              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 9567              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 9567 21 4D 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 956A ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 956C 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 956D 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 956E 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 956F 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9570 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9571 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 9572 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 9573 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 9575 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 9577 C9                                       ret
 348+ 9578
 349+ 9578              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 9578 21 0D 94         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 957B 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 957D 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 957F              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 957F 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 9580 FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 9582 CA 8C 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 9585 23               inc     hl
 358+ 9586 0C               inc     c
 359+ 9587 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 9589                  SetAFalse
 360+ 9589 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 361+ 958B C9               ret
 362+ 958C              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 958C 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 958D C9               ret
 365+ 958E
 366+ 958E              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 958E 21 0D 94         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 9591 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 9593 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 9595              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 9595 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 9596 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 9598 FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 959A CA A4 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 959D 23               inc     hl
 376+ 959E 0C               inc     c
 377+ 959F 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 95A1                  SetAFalse
 378+ 95A1 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 379+ 95A3 C9               ret
 380+ 95A4              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 95A4 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 95A5 C9               ret
 383+ 95A6
 384+ 95A6
 385+ 95A6 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 95C4 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 95C5 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 95C6 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 95C7 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 95C8              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 95C8
 392+ 95C8 21 A6 95     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 393+ 95CB 3A C5 95                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 394+ 95CE FE 00                                    cp      0
 395+ 95D0 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 396+ 95D2 4F                                       ld      c,a
 397+ 95D3 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 398+ 95D5 ED B0                                    ldir
 399+ 95D7 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 400+ 95D9 12                                       ld      (de),a
 401+ 95DA C9                                       ret
 402+ 95DB
 403+ 95DB AF           initInputText:              xor     a
 404+ 95DC 32 C5 95                                 ld      (InputCursor),a
 405+ 95DF 32 C6 95                                 ld      (EnterPressed),a
 406+ 95E2 32 C7 95                                 ld      (InputChanged),a
 407+ 95E5 21 A6 95                                 ld      hl,InputString
 408+ 95E8 06 1E                                    ld      b,30
 409+ 95EA 77           .wipeloop:                  ld      (hl),a
 410+ 95EB 23                                       inc     hl
 411+ 95EC 10 FC                                    djnz    .wipeloop
 412+ 95EE C9                                       ret
 413+ 95EF
 414+ 95EF AF           InputName:              xor     a
 415+ 95F0 32 C7 95                             ld      (InputChanged),a
 416+ 95F3 CD 78 95                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 417+ 95F6 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 418+ 95F8 C8                                   ret     z
 419+ 95F9 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 420+ 95FA 3A C5 95                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 421+ 95FD FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 422+ 95FF 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 423+ 9601 21 9D 94                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 424+ 9604 79                                   ld      a,c
 425+ 9605 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 426+ 9607 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 427+ 9608 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 428+ 960A 30 15                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 429+ 960C              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 430+ 960C FE 30        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 431+ 960E 28 3B                                jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 432+ 9610 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 433+ 9612 28 24                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 434+ 9614 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 435+ 9616 28 33                                jr      z,.CapsPressed
 436+ 9618 FE 5E                                cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 437+ 961A 28 2F                                jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 438+ 961C FE 20                                cp      " "         ; space
 439+ 961E 28 2B                                jr      z,.SpacePressed
 440+ 9620 C9                                   ret
 441+ 9621 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 442+ 9622 3A C5 95                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 443+ 9625 4F                                   ld      c,a
 444+ 9626 21 A6 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 445+ 9629 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 446+ 962B 78                                   ld      a,b
 447+ 962C 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 448+ 962D 79                                   ld      a,c
 449+ 962E 21 C5 95                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 450+ 9631 34                                   inc     (hl)
 451+ 9632                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 451+ 9632 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 451+ 9634 32 C7 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 452+ 9637 C9                                   ret
 453+ 9638 3A C5 95     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 454+ 963B 3C                                   inc     a
 455+ 963C 21 A6 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 456+ 963F ED 31                                add     hl,a
 457+ 9641 AF                                   xor     a
 458+ 9642 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 459+ 9643 3D                                   dec     a
 460+ 9644 32 C6 95                             ld      (EnterPressed),a
 461+ 9647 32 C7 95                             ld      (InputChanged),a
 462+ 964A C9                                   ret
 463+ 964B              .CheckShiftDelete:
 464+ 964B              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 465+ 964B              .SymbolPressed:
 466+ 964B 3A C5 95     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 467+ 964E FE 00                                cp      0
 468+ 9650 C8                                   ret     z
 469+ 9651 3D                                   dec     a
 470+ 9652 32 C5 95                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 471+ 9655 21 A6 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 472+ 9658 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 473+ 965A AF                                   xor     a
 474+ 965B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 475+ 965C                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 475+ 965C 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 475+ 965E 32 C7 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 476+ 9661 C9                                   ret
 477+ 9662
 478+ 9662 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 479+ 9663 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 480+ 9666 3A 22 98                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 481+ 9669 E6 FC                                and     $FC
 482+ 966B 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 483+ 966D 2A 5B 94     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 484+ 9670 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 485+ 9671                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 485+ 9671 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 485+ 9672 CA 80 96    >                        jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 486+ 9675 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 487+ 9678 F6 80                                or      $80
 488+ 967A 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 489+ 967D C3 B6 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 490+ 9680 2A 59 94     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 491+ 9683 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 492+ 9684                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 492+ 9684 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 492+ 9685 CA B6 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 493+ 9688 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 494+ 968B F6 40                                or      $40
 495+ 968D 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 496+ 9690 C3 B6 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 497+ 9693 2A 97 94     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 498+ 9696 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 499+ 9697                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 499+ 9697 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 499+ 9698 CA A6 96    >                        jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 500+ 969B 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 501+ 969E F6 80                                or      $80
 502+ 96A0 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 503+ 96A3 C3 B6 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 504+ 96A6 2A 99 94     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 505+ 96A9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 506+ 96AA                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 506+ 96AA A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 506+ 96AB CA B6 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 507+ 96AE 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 508+ 96B1 F6 40                                or      $40
 509+ 96B3 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 510+ 96B6 2A 55 94     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 511+ 96B9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 512+ 96BA                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 512+ 96BA A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 512+ 96BB CA C7 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRightKey
 513+ 96BE 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 514+ 96C1 F6 20                                or      $20
 515+ 96C3 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 516+ 96C6 C9                                   ret
 517+ 96C7 2A 57 94     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 518+ 96CA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 519+ 96CB                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 519+ 96CB A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 519+ 96CC CA D8 96    >                        jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 520+ 96CF 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 521+ 96D2 F6 10                                or      $10
 522+ 96D4 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 523+ 96D7 C9                                   ret
 524+ 96D8 2A 75 94     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 525+ 96DB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 526+ 96DC                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 526+ 96DC A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 526+ 96DD CA E9 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 527+ 96E0 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 528+ 96E3 F6 08                                or      $08
 529+ 96E5 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 530+ 96E8 C9                                   ret
 531+ 96E9 2A 91 94     ScanRecentreKey:        ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 532+ 96EC 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 533+ 96ED                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 533+ 96ED A7          >                        and     a
 533+ 96EE C8          >                        ret     z
 534+ 96EF 3A 20 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 535+ 96F2 F6 04                                or      $04
 536+ 96F4 32 20 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 537+ 96F7 C9                                   ret

  45+ 9BDF

  48+ 9BE4 70                                   ld      (hl),b

  50+ 9BE6
  51+ 9BE6              ; Clears all except slot A, used when say restarting a space station post launch
  52+ 9BE6 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  53+ 9BE7 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  54+ 9BE9 21 E7 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  55+ 9BEC 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  56+ 9BEE 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c
  57+ 9BEF BA                                   cp      d
  58+ 9BF0 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  59+ 9BF2 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  60+ 9BF4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  61+ 9BF5 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  62+ 9BF6 23                                   inc     hl
  63+ 9BF7 10 F5                                djnz    .fillLoop
  64+ 9BF9 C9                                   ret
  65+ 9BFA
  66+ 9BFA 21 E7 98     ClearSlotA:             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  67+ 9BFD ED 31                                add     hl,a
  68+ 9BFF 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  69+ 9C01 3E 0C                                ld      a,UniverseSlotListSize  ; move to types
  70+ 9C03 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  71+ 9C05 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  72+ 9C07 C9                                   ret
  73+ 9C08              ; Space Station will always be slot 0
  74+ 9C08
  75+ 9C08 21 F4 98     AreShipsPresent:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1

  77+ 9C0D 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
  78+ 9C0E FE 00                                cp      ShipTypeNormal
  79+ 9C10                                      ClearCarryFlag
  79+ 9C10 B7          >                        or a
  80+ 9C11 C8                                   ret     z
  81+ 9C12 23                                   inc     hl
  82+ 9C13 10 F8                                djnz    .NextShip
  83+ 9C15                                      SetCarryFlag
  83+ 9C15 37          >                        scf
  84+ 9C16 C9                                   ret
  85+ 9C17
  86+ 9C17 21 E7 98     IsSpaceStationPresent:  ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  87+ 9C1A                                      ClearCarryFlag
  87+ 9C1A B7          >                        or a
  88+ 9C1B 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  89+ 9C1C                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation
  89+ 9C1C FE 02       >                        cp      ShipTypeStation
  89+ 9C1E C8          >                        ret     z
  90+ 9C1F                                      SetCarryFlag
  90+ 9C1F 37          >                        scf
  91+ 9C20 C9                                   ret

 101+ 9C2D
 102+ 9C2D 21 E7 98     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 103+ 9C30 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize
 104+ 9C32 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
 105+ 9C34 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 106+ 9C35                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
 106+ 9C35 FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
 106+ 9C37 CA 40 9C    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
 107+ 9C3A 0C                                   inc     c
 108+ 9C3B 23                                   inc     hl
 109+ 9C3C 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
 110+ 9C3E                                      SetCarryFlag
 110+ 9C3E 37          >                        scf
 111+ 9C3F C9                                   ret
 112+ 9C40              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 112+ 9C40 B7          >                        or a
 113+ 9C41 C9                                   ret

 116+ 9C45 79                                   ld      a,c

1037  9CA5                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9CA5              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9CA5              doRND2:
   3+ 9CA5 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9CA6              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9CA6              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9CA6 3A 08 97     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9CA9 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9CAB 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9CAC 21 0A 97     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9CAF 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9CB0 32 08 97     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9CB3 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9CB4 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9CB5 32 0A 97                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9CB8 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9CB9 3A 09 97                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9CBC 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9CBD 21 0B 97     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9CC0 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9CC1 32 09 97                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9CC4 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9CC5 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9CC6 32 0B 97                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9CC9 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9CCA C9                                   ret
  26+ 9CCB
  27+ 9CCB              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9CCB 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9CCD 21 0E C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9CD0              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9CD0              EE55:
  32+ 9CD0 CD A6 9C     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9CD3 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9CD4 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9CD5 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9CD7 C9               ret
  37+ 9CD8
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 9CD8 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9CDC 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9CE0 45 44
   2+ 9CE2 21 11 99     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9CE5 11 02 98                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9CE8 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 9CEA ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 9CEC ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9CEE ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9CF0 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9CF2 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9CF4 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9CF5
  12+ 9CF5 21 02 98     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9CF8 11 11 99                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9CFB 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9CFD
  16+ 9CFD 21 11 99     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9D00 11 05 99                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9D03 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9D05
  20+ 9D05 21 05 99     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9D08 11 11 99                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9D0B 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9D0D
  24+ 9D0D 21 05 99     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9D10 11 02 98                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9D13 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9D15
  28+ 9D15 21 02 98     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9D18 11 05 99                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9D1B 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9D1D
  32+ 9D1D              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9D1D CD 20 9D     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9D20              .NextStep:
  35+ 9D20 CD 23 9D     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9D23              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9D23 3A 02 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9D26 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9D27 21 04 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9D2A 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9D2B 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9D2C 3A 03 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9D2F 21 05 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9D32 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9D33 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9D34 3A 04 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9D37 32 02 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9D3A 3A 05 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9D3D 32 03 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9D40 3A 07 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9D43 32 05 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9D46 3A 06 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9D49 32 04 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9D4C B7           		or		a
  55+ 9D4D 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9D4E 21 04 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9D51 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9D52 32 06 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9D55 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9D56 21 05 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9D59 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9D5A 32 07 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9D5D C9           		ret
  64+ 9D5E
  65+ 9D5E              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9D5E CD 61 9D     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9D61              .NextStep:
  68+ 9D61 CD 64 9D     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9D64              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9D64              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9D64 3A 05 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9D67 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9D68 21 07 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9D6B 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9D6C 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9D6D              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9D6D 3A 06 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9D70 21 08 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9D73 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9D74 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9D75 3A 07 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9D78 32 05 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9D7B 3A 08 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9D7E 32 06 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 9D81 3A 0A 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9D84 32 08 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9D87 3A 09 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9D8A 32 07 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9D8D B7           		or		a
  90+ 9D8E 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 9D8F 21 07 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9D92 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9D93 32 09 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9D96 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9D97 21 08 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9D9A 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9D9B 32 0A 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9D9E C9           		ret
  99+ 9D9F
 100+ 9D9F 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9DA0 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9DA1 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9DA2
 104+ 9DA2 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9DA3 32 1B 98                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9DA6 3A 03 98     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 9DA9 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 9DAA 3A 18 99     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 9DAD 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 9DAE 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 9DAF 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 9DB0 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 9DB2 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 9DB4 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 9DB6 32 A1 9D     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 9DB9 ED 5B 9F 9D                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 9DBD BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 9DBE 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 9DC0 3A 05 98     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 9DC3 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 9DC4 3A 17 99                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 9DC7 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 9DC8 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 9DC9 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 9DCA CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 9DCC 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 9DCE ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 9DD0 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 9DD1 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 9DD2 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 9DD4 3A A1 9D     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 9DD7 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 9DD8 ED 43 9F 9D                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 9DDC C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 9DDD CD 15 9D                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 9DE0 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 9DE1 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 9DE2 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 9DE3 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 9DE4 CD 1D 9D     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 9DE7 3A 1B 98                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 9DEA 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 9DEB FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 9DED C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 9DEE 32 1B 98                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 9DF1 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 9DF3
 148+ 9DF3              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 9DF3 3A 06 99     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 9DF6 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 9DF8 32 A1 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 9DFB 3A 07 99     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 9DFE CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 9E00 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 9E02 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 9E04 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 9E06 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 9E08 32 A2 98     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 9E0B CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 9E0D FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 9E0F 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 9E11              .Fedual:
 163+ 9E11 3A A1 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 9E14 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 9E16 32 A1 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 9E19              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 9E19 3A A1 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 9E1C EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 9E1E 32 A3 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 9E21 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 9E22 3A 08 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 9E25 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 9E27 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 9E28 32 A3 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 9E2B 3A A2 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 9E2E CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 9E30 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 9E31 3A A3 98     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 9E34 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 9E35 32 A3 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 9E38 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 9E3A CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 9E3C 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 9E3D 3A A1 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 9E40 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 9E41 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 9E42 3A A2 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 9E45 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 9E46 32 A4 98     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 9E49 3A A1 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 9E4C EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 9E4E C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 9E50 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 9E51 3A A2 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 9E54 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 9E56 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 9E57 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 9E59 3A A4 98     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 9E5C 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 9E5D ED 30        		mul
 201+ 9E5F CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 9E61 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 9E63 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 9E65 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 9E67 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 9E69 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 9E6B ED 53 A6 98  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 9E6F              .DoRadius:
 209+ 9E6F 3A 08 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 9E72 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 9E73 3A 0A 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 9E76 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 9E78 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 9E7A 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 9E7B ED 43 AA 98  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 9E7F C9           		ret
 217+ 9E80
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  34+ 9FB4 54 9F 59 9F
  34+ 9FB8 61 9F 6F 9F

  34+ 9FC4 A9 9F
  35+ 9FC6              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  36+ 9FC6
  37+ 9FC6
  38+ 9FC6              getTableText:
  39+ 9FC6              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9FC6              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9FC6 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9FC7 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9FC9 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9FCB 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9FCC 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9FCD 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9FCE EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9FCF D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9FD0 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9FD1
  51+ 9FD1
  52+ 9FD1              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9FD1              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9FD1              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9FD1              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9FD1              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9FD1              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9FD1              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9FD1              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9FD1              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9FD1 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9FD2 B3           	or		e
  63+ 9FD3 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9FD5 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9FD6 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9FD7 21 25 9F     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9FDA              .testLoop:
  68+ 9FDA 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9FDB 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9FDC 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9FDD E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9FDE 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9FDF 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9FE0 CD E0 AB     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9FE3 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9FE5              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9FE5 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9FE6 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9FE7 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9FE8 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9FE9 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9FEB              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9FEB E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9FEC C9           	ret
  85+ 9FED
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 181+ A46E              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A46E              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A46E              .CapLoop:
 184+ A46E 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A46F 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A470 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A472 C8           	ret		z
 188+ A473 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A475 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A477 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A479 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A47B              .LowerCase:
 193+ A47B C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A47D 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A47E 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A480
 197+ A480              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A480 21 F1 A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A483 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A485 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A487 D5           	push	de
 202+ A488 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A489 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A48A 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A48B EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A48C D1           	pop		de
 207+ A48D C9           	ret
 208+ A48E
 209+ A48E
 210+ A48E              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A48E              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A48E 21 17 A4     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A491 CD C6 9F     	call	getTableText
 214+ A494 11 4D A4     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A497              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A497 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A498 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A49A 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A49C E5           	push	hl
 220+ A49D D5           	push	de
 221+ A49E 21 F1 A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A4A1 CD C6 9F     	call	getTableText
 223+ A4A4 D1           	pop		de
 224+ A4A5              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A4A5 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A4A6 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A4A8 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A4AA              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A4AA 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A4AB 13           	inc		de
 231+ A4AC 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A4AD 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A4AF              .AddSpace:
 234+ A4AF 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A4B1 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A4B2 13           	inc		de
 237+ A4B3 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A4B4 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A4B5 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A4B7              .ReadDone:
 241+ A4B7 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A4B8 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A4B9 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A4BA C9           	ret

  12+ A534              NamingLoop:
  13+ A534 3A 0A 99     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ A537 E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ A539 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ A53B 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ A53D C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ A53F CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ A541 21 BB A4     	ld		hl,name_digrams

 107+ A555              ;ExtraTokenCheck:
 108+ A555              ;	push	de							; save target address

 111+ A555              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ A555              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ A555              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ A555              ;	ld
 115+ A555              ;
 116+ A555              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ A555              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ A555              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ A555              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ A555              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ A555              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ A555              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ A555              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ A555              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ A555              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ A555              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ A555              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ A555              ;
 129+ A555              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ A555              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ A555              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ A555              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ A555              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ A555              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ A555              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ A555              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ A555              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ A555              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ A555              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ A555              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ A555              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ A555              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ A555              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ A555              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ A555              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ A555              ;C8                      INY
 149+ A555              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ A555              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ A555              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ A555              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ A555              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ A555              ;98                      TYA
 156+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ A555              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ A555              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ A555              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ A555              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ A555              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ A555              ;68                      PLA
 165+ A555              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ A555              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ A555              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ A555              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ A555              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ A555              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ A555              ;
 174+ A555              ;
 175+ A555              ;
 176+ A555              ;
 177+ A555              ;
 178+ A555              ;
 179+ A555              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ A555              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ A555              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ A555              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ A555              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ A555              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ A555              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ A555              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ A555              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ A555              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ A555              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ A555              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ A555              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ A555              ;60                      RTS
 199+ A555              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ A555              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ A555              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ A555              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ A555              ;60                      RTS
 204+ A555              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ A555              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ A555              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ A555              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ A555              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ A555              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ A555              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ A555              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ A555              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ A555              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ A555              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ A555              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A555              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A555              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A555              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A555              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A555              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A555              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A555              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A555              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A555              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A555              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A555              ;
 227+ A555              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A555              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A555              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A555              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A555              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A555              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A555              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A555              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A555              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A555              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A555              ;
 239+ A555              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A555              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A555              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A555              ;
 243+ A555              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A555              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A555              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A555              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A555              ;
 248+ A555              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A555              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A555              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A555              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A555              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A555              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A555              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A555              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A555              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A555              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A555              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A555              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A555              ;
 262+ A555              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A555              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A555              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A555              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A555              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A555              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A555              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A555              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A555              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ A555              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ A555              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ A555              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ A555              ;
 275+ A555              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ A555              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ A555              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ A555              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ A555              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ A555              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ A555              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ A555              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ A555              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ A555              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ A555              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ A555              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ A555              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ A555              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ A555              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ A555              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ A555              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ A555              ;C8                      INY
 295+ A555              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ A555              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ A555              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ A555              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ A555              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ A555              ;98                      TYA
 302+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ A555              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ A555              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ A555              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ A555              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ A555              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ A555              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ A555              ;68                      PLA
 311+ A555              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ A555              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ A555              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ A555              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ A555              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ A555              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ A555              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ A555              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ A555              ;
 320+ A555              ;
 321+ A555              ;
# file closed: ./Tables/name_digrams.asm

   1+ A555 CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
   2+ A557 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
   3+ A559 CD F6 AB                             call    negate16hl
   4+ A55C CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
   5+ A55E 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
   6+ A560 CD FD AB                             call    negate16de
   7+ A563 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
   8+ A564 AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
   9+ A565 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  10+ A567 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
