1047  A56E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A56E              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A56E 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A56F 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A570 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A571 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A573 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A574 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A575 ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A577 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A578 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A57A B4                                   or      h
  12+ A57B C9                                   ret
  13+ A57C              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A57C 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A57D 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A57E 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A57F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A581 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A583 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A584 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A586 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A587                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A587 B7          >                        or a
  23+ A588 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A58A C9                                   ret
  25+ A58B 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A58C ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A58E C9                                   ret
  28+ A58F
  29+ A58F              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A58F 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A590 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A591 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A593 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A595 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A596 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A598 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A59A 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A59B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A59D 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A59E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A59F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A5A1 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A5A2 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A5A3 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A5A4 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A5A5 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A5A6 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A5A7 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A5A8 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A5A9 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A5AA FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A5AC 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A5AD C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A5AE 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A5AF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A5B1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A5B3 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A5B4 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A5B5 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A5B7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A5B9 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A5BA E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A5BB 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A5BD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A5BF E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A5C0 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A5C2 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A5C4 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A5C5                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A5C5 BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A5C6 DA D0 A5    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A5C9 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A5CB              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A5CB AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A5CC 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A5CD 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A5CE 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A5CF C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A5D0              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A5D0 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A5D1 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A5D2 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A5D3 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A5D4 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A5D5 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A5D6 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A5D7 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A5D8 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A5D9 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A5DB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A5DD B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A5DE 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A5DF C9                                   ret
  92+ A5E0 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A5E1 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A5E2 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A5E3 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A5E4 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A5E5 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A5E6 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A5E7 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A5E8 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A5E9 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A5EB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A5ED B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A5EE 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A5EF C9                                   ret
 106+ A5F0
 107+ A5F0
 108+ A5F0              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A5F0 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A5F1 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A5F2 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A5F3 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A5F5 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A5F7 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A5F8 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A5F9 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A5FB D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A5FC 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A5FD EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A5FE A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A5FF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A601 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A602 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A603
 125+ A603
 126+ A603
 127+ A603              ; a = value to add
 128+ A603              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A603              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A603              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A603 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A606 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A607 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A608 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A60A 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A60B E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A60D 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A60E 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A60F E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A611              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A611              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A611              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A611              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A611 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A612 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A613 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A614 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A615 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A616 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A617 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A618 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A61A 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A61C              .negativecalc:
 154+ A61C 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A61D E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A61F 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A620 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A622 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A624 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A626 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A628 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A629 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A62A E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A62C DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A62E F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A630 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A631 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A632 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A633 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A634 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A635 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A636 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A637 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A638              .nocarry:
 175+ A638 CD F6 AB             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A63B B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A63C EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A63D 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A63E 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A63F 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A640 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A641 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A642 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A643 C9                   ret
 185+ A644              .postivecalc:
 186+ A644 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A646 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A648 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A649 EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A64A DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A64C 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A64D 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A64E 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A64F 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A650 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A651 C9                   ret
 197+ A652
 198+ A652              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A652              ;MVT1
 200+ A652              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A652              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A652              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A652              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A652              ;
 205+ A652              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A652              ;        b = 0
 207+ A652              ;        c = varS
 208+ A652              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A652              ;        retain carry
 210+ A652              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A652              ;        and 7F
 212+ A652              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A652              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A652              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A652              ;
 216+ A652              ;    else
 217+ A652              ;MV10.
 218+ A652              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A652              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A652
 221+ A652
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm

   1+ A652              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A652 2A 4B 9C     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A655 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A656 22 4B 9C                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A659 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A65C 2A 4D 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A65F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A661 22 4D 9C                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A664 C9                                   ret
  10+ A665
  11+ A665 2A 4B 9C     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)

  13+ A669 B5                                   or      l

  15+ A66D B4                                   or      h
  16+ A66E B5                                   or      l
  17+ A66F C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return

  19+ A671 2A 4B 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A674 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A676 22 4B 9C                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A679 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A67C 2A 4D 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)

  26+ A686 C2 8A A6    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A689 C9                                   ret

1049  A694                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A694              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A694              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A694 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A695 E5                                   push hl
   5+ A696 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A698 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A69A E5                                   push hl
   8+ A69B AF                                   xor a
   9+ A69C 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A69D 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A69E DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A6A0 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A6A2 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A6A4 17                                   rla
  15+ A6A5 B9                                   cp c
  16+ A6A6 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A6A8 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A6AA ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A6AC 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A6AD 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A6AF ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A6B1 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A6B2 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A6B4 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A6B5 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A6B6 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A6B7 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A6B9 D1                                   pop de
  29+ A6BA 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A6BB DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A6BD D1                                   pop de
  32+ A6BE C9                                   ret
  33+ A6BF
  34+ A6BF FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A6C1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A6C3 CD 94 A6                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A6C6 F5                                   push    af
  38+ A6C7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A6C9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A6CB B1                                   or      c
  41+ A6CC 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A6CD F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A6CE C9                                   ret
  44+ A6CF
  45+ A6CF
  46+ A6CF FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A6D1 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A6D2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A6D4 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A6D6 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A6D7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A6D9 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A6DA FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A6DC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A6DE CD 94 A6                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A6E1 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A6E3 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A6E5 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A6E6 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A6E8 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A6E9 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A6EB C9                                   ret
  63+ A6EC
  64+ A6EC              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A6EC              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A6EC              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A6EC              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A6EC 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A6ED 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A6EF 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A6F1 3A 16 98                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A6F4 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A6F5 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A6F8 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A6F9 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A6FB CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A6FD 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A6FE ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A700 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A702 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A704 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A705 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A706 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A708 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A709 32 17 98                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A70C C9                                   ret
  87+ A70D
  88+ A70D              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A70D              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A70D 32 11 97     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A710                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A710 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A713 22 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A716 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A719 32 18 98                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A71C ED 5B 0F 97  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A720 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A721 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A723 32 0F 97                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A726 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A727 3A 11 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A72A 21 18 98                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A72D AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A72E E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A730 32 33 98                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A733 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A736 3A 11 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A739 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A73B              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A73B FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A73D D2 4B A7    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A740                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A740 CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A742 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ A744 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ A746 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ A748 C2 3B A7                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ A74B 32 11 97     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ A74E ED 53 0F 97                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ A752 3A 18 98                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ A755 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ A757                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ A757 2A 16 98                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ A75A FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ A75C                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ A75C CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ A75E CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ A760 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ A762 F2 5A A7                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ A765 22 16 98     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ A768 32 16 98                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ A76B 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ A76D 32 17 98                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ A770 3A 11 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ A773 CD EC A6                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ A776 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ A778 32 2B 98                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ A77B 32 2C 98                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ A77E 32 2D 98                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ A781 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ A783                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ A783 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ A785 CA B0 A7    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ A788 3A 17 98                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ A78B ED 5B 2A 98                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ A78F 2A 2E 98                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ A792 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ A793 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ A795 CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ A797 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ A799 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ A79B FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ A79D 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ A79F ED 53 2A 98  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ A7A3 22 2E 98                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ A7A6 3A 33 98                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ A7A9 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ A7AA 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ A7AB B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ A7AC 32 3D 98                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ A7AF C9                                   ret
 152+ A7B0              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ A7B0 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ A7B1 CA C8 A7    >                        jp	z, DV13
 153+ A7B4 3A 17 98                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ A7B7 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ A7B9 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ A7BB C2 B7 A7                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ A7BE 32 2A 98                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ A7C1                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ A7C1 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 158+ A7C4 32 2D 98    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ A7C7 C9                                   ret
 160+ A7C8              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ A7C8 3A 17 98    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 160+ A7CB 32 2A 98    >                        ld       (varK),a
 161+ A7CE                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ A7CE 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 161+ A7D1 32 2D 98    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ A7D4 C9                                   ret
 163+ A7D5
 164+ A7D5
 165+ A7D5 CD 0D A7     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ A7D8 3A 2D 98                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ A7DB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ A7DD 21 2C 98                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ A7E0 B6                                   or      (hl)
 170+ A7E1 C2 F6 A7                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 171+ A7E4 3A 2B 98                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 172+ A7E7 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ A7E9 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 174+ A7EB                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 174+ A7EB B7          >                        or a
 175+ A7EC 2A 2A 98                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)

 177+ A7F2 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 178+ A7F4 C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 179+ A7F5 C9           PL44:                   ret

   1+ A7F8              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A7F8 2A 17 98                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A7FB 3A 16 98                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A7FE C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A800 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A803 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A804                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A804 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A806 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

   9+ A80A 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A80C EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A80D 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A80E EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A80F              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1

  17+ A819 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result

  21+ A81D
  22+ A81D              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A81D ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A81D ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A81D ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A81D ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A81D ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A81D ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A81D ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A81D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A81D ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A81D ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A81D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A81D ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A81D ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A81D ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A81D ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A81D ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A81D                                      ENDM

  44+ A81D              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned

  54+ A83F 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A840 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A842 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A843 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A844                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A844 FA 5C A8    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A847 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A848 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A849                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A849 FA 4E A8    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A84C 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A84D C9                                   ret
  64+ A84E 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A84F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A851 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A852 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A853 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A855 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A856 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A857 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A859 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A85A 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A85B C9                                   ret
  75+ A85C 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A85D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A85F 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A860 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A861 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A863 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A864 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A865 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A867 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A869 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A86A B4                                   or      h
  86+ A86B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A86C C9                                   ret
  88+ A86D              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A86D AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A86E 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A86F 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A870 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A871 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A872 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A873 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A874 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A876 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A877 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A878 C9                                   ret
  94+ A879
  95+ A879
  96+ A879                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A879                  ;
  98+ A879                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A879                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A879                  ;
 101+ A879                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A879                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A879                  ;
 104+ A879                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A879 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A87A 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A87B ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A87D EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A87E ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A880
 111+ A880 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A881 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A882 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A883 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A884
 116+ A884 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A885 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A887 C9                                   ret
 119+ A888
 120+ A888
 121+ A888
 122+ A888                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A888                 ;
 124+ A888                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A888                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A888                 ;
 127+ A888                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A888                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A888                 ;
 130+ A888                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A888
 132+ A888
 133+ A888
 134+ A888 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A889 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A88A 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A88B 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A88C E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A88D 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A88E              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A88E ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A890 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A891 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A893
 145+ A893 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A894 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A895 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A896
 149+ A896 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A897 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A898 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A89A
 153+ A89A 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A89B 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A89C
 156+ A89C 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A89D 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A89E 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A89F 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A8A0
 161+ A8A0 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A8A1 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A8A3
 164+ A8A3 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A8A4 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A8A6 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A8A7
 168+ A8A7 C9                                   ret
 169+ A8A8
 170+ A8A8              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A8A8              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A8A8              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A8A8              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A8A8              ;         carry reset
 175+ A8A8              ; maths is
 176+ A8A8              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A8A8              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A8A8              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A8A8              ;
 180+ A8A8              ;
 181+ A8A8              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A8A8 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A8A9 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A8AA 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A8AB 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A8AC 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A8AD 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A8AE ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A8B0 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A8B1 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A8B3 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A8B4 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A8B5 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A8B6 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A8B8 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A8B9 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A8BA 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A8BB 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A8BC                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A8BC AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A8BD C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A8BE C9                                   ret
 203+ A8BF
 204+ A8BF              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 205+ A8BF 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d
 206+ A8C0 AC                                   xor     h
 207+ A8C1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 208+ A8C3 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 209+ A8C5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 210+ A8C6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 211+ A8C8 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; hle = abs (hle)
 212+ A8C9 7A                                   ld      a,d
 213+ A8CA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 214+ A8CC 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; now also d = abs d
 215+ A8CD ED 30        .PerformMultiply:       mul                         ; de = E*A
 216+ A8CF 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; c = low E*A
 217+ A8D0 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ;
 218+ A8D1 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; hl = H,A
 219+ A8D2 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = (E*A)/256
 220+ A8D3 55                                   ld      d,l                 ; de = A,L
 221+ A8D4 ED 30                                mul                         ; de = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 222+ A8D6 ED 32                                add     de,a                ; .
 223+ A8D8 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; hl = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 224+ A8D9 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; A =  E*A, de = HA
 225+ A8DA ED 30                                mul
 226+ A8DC ED 32                                add     de,a                ;
 227+ A8DE 7A                                   ld      a,d
 228+ A8DF FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover sign
 229+ A8E1 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; sign back on d
 230+ A8E2 C9                                   ret
 231+ A8E3
 232+ A8E3
 233+ A8E3              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 234+ A8E3              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 235+ A8E3              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 236+ A8E3              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 237+ A8E3              ;         carry reset
 238+ A8E3              ;
 239+ A8E3              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 240+ A8E3 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 241+ A8E4 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 242+ A8E5 32 E3 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A8E8 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A8E9 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A8EC 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 246+ A8EE E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A8F0 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A8F1 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A8F3 32 E3 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A8F6 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 251+ A8F7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 252+ A8FA 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 253+ A8FC E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 254+ A8FE 67                                   ld      h,a
 255+ A8FF 3A E3 A8                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 256+ A902 EE 80                                xor     $80
 257+ A904 32 E3 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 258+ A907 CD A8 A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 259+ A90A 3A E3 A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 260+ A90D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 261+ A910 C8                                   ret     z
 262+ A911 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 263+ A912 95                                   sub 	l
 264+ A913 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 265+ A914 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 266+ A915 94                                   sub 	h
 267+ A916 67                                   ld 		h,a
 268+ A917 C9                                   ret
 269+ A918
 270+ A918 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 271+ A919 32 E3 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 272+ A91C 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 273+ A91D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 274+ A920 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 275+ A922 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 276+ A924 57                                   ld      d,a
 277+ A925 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 278+ A927 32 E3 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 279+ A92A CD A8 A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 280+ A92D 3A E3 A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 281+ A930 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 282+ A933 C8                                   ret     z
 283+ A934 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 284+ A935 95                                   sub 	l
 285+ A936 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 286+ A937 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 287+ A938 94                                   sub 	h
 288+ A939 67                                   ld 		h,a
 289+ A93A C9                                   ret
 290+ A93B
 291+ A93B
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1051  A93B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A93B              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A93B              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A93B
   4+ A93B              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A93B ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A93B ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A93B ~            			mul
   8+ A93B              			ENDM
   9+ A93B
  10+ A93B              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A93B ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A93B ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A93B ~            			mul
  14+ A93B ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A93B              			ENDM
  16+ A93B
  17+ A93B
  18+ A93B              asm_squa:
  19+ A93B E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A93D              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A93D              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A93D              asm_squa2:
  23+ A93D 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A93E 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A93F ED 30        	mul
  26+ A941 ED 53 0F 97  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A945 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A946 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1052  A947                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A947              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A947              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A947              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A947              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A947              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A947              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A947 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A94A 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A94B 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A94C              .sqrloop:
  11+ A94C CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A94E CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A950 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A951 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A952 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A954 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A956 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A957 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A958 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A95A              .sqrbit:
  21+ A95A 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A95B EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A95C B7           	or a
  24+ A95D ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A95F              .sqrfi:
  26+ A95F CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A961 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A963 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A965 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A967 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A969 C9           	ret
  32+ A96A
  33+ A96A
  34+ A96A              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A96A 3A 16 98     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A96D 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A96E 3A 17 98     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A971 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A972 CD 47 A9     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A975 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A976 32 16 98     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A979 C9           	ret
  43+ A97A
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1053  A97A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A97A              ;
   2+ A97A              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ A97A              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ A97A              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ A97A              ;               if a >= D
   6+ A97A              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ A97A              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ A97A              ;           else
   9+ A97A
  10+ A97A              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ A97A              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ A97A              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ A97A              ;
  14+ A97A              ;
  15+ A97A              ;
  16+ A97A
  17+ A97A              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  17+ A97A BA          >                        cp     d
  17+ A97B D2 99 A9    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  18+ A97E 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  19+ A980 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  20+ A982 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  21+ A984                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  21+ A984 BA          >                        cp      d
  21+ A985 DA 8A A9    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  22+ A988 92                                   sub     d
  23+ A989                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  23+ A989 B7          >                        or a
  24+ A98A              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  24+ A98A 3F          >                        ccf
  25+ A98B CB 13                                rl      e
  26+ A98D 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  27+ A98F 7B                                   ld      a,e
  28+ A990 C9                                   ret
  29+ A991 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  30+ A992                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  30+ A992 37          >                        scf
  31+ A993 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  32+ A995 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  33+ A997 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  34+ A998 C9                                   ret
  35+ A999 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  36+ A99B C9                                   ret
  37+ A99C
  38+ A99C
  39+ A99C              ; Divide 8-bit values
  40+ A99C              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  41+ A99C              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  42+ A99C              ;
  43+ A99C              ;;;Div8:
  44+ A99C              ;;;    xor a
  45+ A99C              ;;;    ld b,8
  46+ A99C              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  47+ A99C              ;;;    rl e
  48+ A99C              ;;;    rla
  49+ A99C              ;;;    sub c
  50+ A99C              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  51+ A99C              ;;;    add a,c
  52+ A99C              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  53+ A99C              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  54+ A99C              ;;;    ld b,a0
  55+ A99C              ;;;    ld a,e
  56+ A99C              ;;;    rla
  57+ A99C              ;;;    cpl
  58+ A99C              ;;;    ret
  59+ A99C
  60+ A99C              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  61+ A99C              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  62+ A99C              ;;         A is a copy of E
  63+ A99C              ;;         HL is the remainder
  64+ A99C              ;;         BC is not changed
  65+ A99C              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  66+ A99C              ;140 bytes
  67+ A99C              ;145cc
  68+ A99C
  69+ A99C              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  70+ A99C ~                                rla
  71+ A99C ~                                adc     hl,hl
  72+ A99C ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  73+ A99C ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  74+ A99C ~                                add     hl,bc
  75+ A99C                                  ENDM
  76+ A99C
  77+ A99C              DEequDEDivBC:
  78+ A99C AF               xor a
  79+ A99D ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  80+ A99F 7A               ld a,d
  81+ A9A0                  MacroDEDivBC
  81+ A9A0 17          >                    rla
  81+ A9A1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  81+ A9A3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  81+ A9A5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  81+ A9A7 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  82+ A9A8                  MacroDEDivBC
  82+ A9A8 17          >                    rla
  82+ A9A9 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  82+ A9AB ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  82+ A9AD 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  82+ A9AF 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  83+ A9B0                  MacroDEDivBC
  83+ A9B0 17          >                    rla
  83+ A9B1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  83+ A9B3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  83+ A9B5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  83+ A9B7 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  84+ A9B8                  MacroDEDivBC
  84+ A9B8 17          >                    rla

  84+ A9BB ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  84+ A9BD 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3

  86+ A9CD 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3

 103+ AA25 2F               cpl
