 105+ AA27 C9               ret
 106+ AA28
 107+ AA28
 108+ AA28
 109+ AA28              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 110+ AA28              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 111+ AA28              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 112+ AA28              ; Our use
 113+ AA28              ; BC = A0
 114+ AA28              ; DE = 0C
 115+ AA28              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 116+ AA28              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 116+ AA28 B9          >                        cp     c
 116+ AA29 D2 54 AA    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 117+ AA2C 47                                   ld      b,a
 118+ AA2D 59                                   ld      e,c
 119+ AA2E 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 120+ AA30 16 00                                ld      d,0
 121+ AA32 C3 3F AA                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 122+ AA35 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 123+ AA36 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 124+ AA38 21 16 98                             ld      hl,varQ
 125+ AA3B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 126+ AA3C 16 00                                ld      d,0
 127+ AA3E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 128+ AA3F              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 129+ AA3F 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 130+ AA42 78                                   ld      a,b
 131+ AA43 06 10                                ld      b,16
 132+ AA45 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 133+ AA47 17                                   rla			; ...
 134+ AA48 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 135+ AA4A ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 136+ AA4C 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 137+ AA4E 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 138+ AA4F 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 139+ AA50 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 140+ AA52 47                                   ld   b,a
 141+ AA53 C9                                   ret
 142+ AA54 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 143+ AA57 C9                                   ret
 144+ AA58
 145+ AA58              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 146+ AA58 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 147+ AA5A AF                                   xor a
 148+ AA5B CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 149+ AA5D 17                                   rla
 150+ AA5E BA                                   cp d
 151+ AA5F 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 151+ AA61
 152+ AA61 0C                                   inc c
 153+ AA62 92                                   sub d
 154+ AA63 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 155+ AA65 C9                                   ret
 156+ AA66              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 157+ AA66 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 158+ AA68 AF                                   xor a
 159+ AA69 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 160+ AA6B CB 14                                rl	h
 161+ AA6D              ;    add hl,hl
 162+ AA6D 17                                   rla
 163+ AA6E B9                                   cp c
 164+ AA6F 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 165+ AA71 2C                                   inc l
 166+ AA72 91                                   sub c
 167+ AA73 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 168+ AA75 C9                                   ret
 169+ AA76              ;
 170+ AA76              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 171+ AA76              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 172+ AA76              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 173+ AA76              ;
 174+ AA76              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 175+ AA76 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 176+ AA76 ~            					rla				; ...
 177+ AA76 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 178+ AA76 ~            					jr	1F
 179+ AA76 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 180+ AA76 ~            1:
 181+ AA76 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 182+ AA76              					ENDM
 183+ AA76
 184+ AA76
 185+ AA76
 186+ AA76              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 187+ AA76 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 188+ AA79 78                               ld a,b
 189+ AA7A 06 08                            ld b,8
 190+ AA7C 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 191+ AA7D ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 192+ AA7F ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 193+ AA81 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 194+ AA83 19                               add hl,de
 195+ AA84 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 196+ AA86 17                               rla
 197+ AA87 2F                               cpl
 198+ AA88 47                               ld b,a
 199+ AA89 79                               ld a,c
 200+ AA8A 48                               ld c,b
 201+ AA8B 06 08                            ld b,8
 202+ AA8D 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 203+ AA8E ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 204+ AA90 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 205+ AA92 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 206+ AA94 19                               add hl,de
 207+ AA95 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 208+ AA97 17                               rla
 209+ AA98 2F                               cpl
 210+ AA99 41                               ld b,c
 211+ AA9A 4F                               ld c,a
 212+ AA9B C9                               ret
 213+ AA9C
 214+ AA9C
 215+ AA9C
 216+ AA9C              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 217+ AA9C ~            				   rla
 218+ AA9C ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ AA9C ~            				   add	hl,de
 220+ AA9C ~            				   jr	c,1F
 221+ AA9C ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ AA9C ~            1:
 223+ AA9C              				   ENDM
 224+ AA9C
 225+ AA9C
 226+ AA9C              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 227+ AA9C              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 228+ AA9C              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 229+ AA9C              ;min: 738cc
 230+ AA9C              ;max: 898cc
 231+ AA9C              ;avg: 818cc
 232+ AA9C              ;144 bytes
 233+ AA9C AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 234+ AA9D 67                                   ld h,a
 235+ AA9E 6F                                   ld l,a
 236+ AA9F 93                                   sub e
 237+ AAA0 5F                                   ld e,a
 238+ AAA1 9F                                   sbc a,a
 239+ AAA2 92                                   sub d
 240+ AAA3 57                                   ld d,a
 241+ AAA4 78                                   ld a,b
 242+ AAA5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 242+ AAA5 17          >				   rla
 242+ AAA6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 242+ AAA8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 242+ AAA9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 242+ AAAB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 242+ AAAD             >1:
 243+ AAAD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 243+ AAAD 17          >				   rla
 243+ AAAE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 243+ AAB0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 243+ AAB1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 243+ AAB3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 243+ AAB5             >1:
 244+ AAB5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 244+ AAB5 17          >				   rla
 244+ AAB6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 244+ AAB8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 244+ AAB9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 244+ AABB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 244+ AABD             >1:
 245+ AABD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 245+ AABD 17          >				   rla
 245+ AABE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 245+ AAC0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 245+ AAC1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 245+ AAC3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 245+ AAC5             >1:
 246+ AAC5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 246+ AAC5 17          >				   rla
 246+ AAC6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 246+ AAC8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 246+ AAC9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 246+ AACB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 246+ AACD             >1:
 247+ AACD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 247+ AACD 17          >				   rla
 247+ AACE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 247+ AAD0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 247+ AAD1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 247+ AAD3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 247+ AAD5             >1:
 248+ AAD5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 248+ AAD5 17          >				   rla
 248+ AAD6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 248+ AAD8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 248+ AAD9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 248+ AADB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 248+ AADD             >1:
 249+ AADD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 249+ AADD 17          >				   rla
 249+ AADE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 249+ AAE0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 249+ AAE1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 249+ AAE3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 249+ AAE5             >1:
 250+ AAE5 17                                   rla
 251+ AAE6 47                                   ld b,a
 252+ AAE7
 253+ AAE7 79                                   ld a,c
 254+ AAE8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 254+ AAE8 17          >				   rla
 254+ AAE9 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 254+ AAEB 19          >				   add	hl,de
 254+ AAEC 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 254+ AAEE ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 254+ AAF0             >1:
 255+ AAF0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 255+ AAF0 17          >				   rla
 255+ AAF1 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 255+ AAF3 19          >				   add	hl,de
 255+ AAF4 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 255+ AAF6 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 255+ AAF8             >1:
 256+ AAF8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 256+ AAF8 17          >				   rla
 256+ AAF9 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 256+ AAFB 19          >				   add	hl,de
 256+ AAFC 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 256+ AAFE ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 256+ AB00             >1:
 257+ AB00                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 257+ AB00 17          >				   rla
 257+ AB01 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 257+ AB03 19          >				   add	hl,de
 257+ AB04 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 257+ AB06 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 257+ AB08             >1:
 258+ AB08                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 258+ AB08 17          >				   rla
 258+ AB09 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 258+ AB0B 19          >				   add	hl,de
 258+ AB0C 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 258+ AB0E ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 258+ AB10             >1:
 259+ AB10                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 259+ AB10 17          >				   rla
 259+ AB11 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 259+ AB13 19          >				   add	hl,de
 259+ AB14 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 259+ AB16 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 259+ AB18             >1:
 260+ AB18                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 260+ AB18 17          >				   rla
 260+ AB19 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 260+ AB1B 19          >				   add	hl,de
 260+ AB1C 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 260+ AB1E ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 260+ AB20             >1:
 261+ AB20                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 261+ AB20 17          >				   rla
 261+ AB21 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 261+ AB23 19          >				   add	hl,de
 261+ AB24 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 261+ AB26 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 261+ AB28             >1:
 262+ AB28 17                                   rla
 263+ AB29 4F                                   ld c,a
 264+ AB2A C9                                   ret
 265+ AB2B
 266+ AB2B              ;Inputs:
 267+ AB2B              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 268+ AB2B              ;Outputs:
 269+ AB2B              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 270+ AB2B              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 271+ AB2B              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 272+ AB2B              ;Otherwise:
 273+ AB2B              ;min: 1107cc
 274+ AB2B              ;max: 1319cc
 275+ AB2B              ;avg: 1201cc
 276+ AB2B 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 277+ AB2C AA                                   xor d
 278+ AB2D F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 279+ AB2E              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 280+ AB2E A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 281+ AB2F F2 38 AB                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 282+ AB32 AF                                   xor a
 283+ AB33 91                                   sub c
 284+ AB34 4F                                   ld c,a
 285+ AB35 9F                                   sbc a,a
 286+ AB36 90                                   sub b
 287+ AB37 47                                   ld b,a
 288+ AB38 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 289+ AB39 B2                                   or d
 290+ AB3A FA 43 AB                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 291+ AB3D AF                                   xor a
 292+ AB3E 93                                   sub e
 293+ AB3F 5F                                   ld e,a
 294+ AB40 9F                                   sbc a,a
 295+ AB41 92                                   sub d
 296+ AB42 57                                   ld d,a
 297+ AB43 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 298+ AB44 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 299+ AB46 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 300+ AB48 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 301+ AB49 83                                   add a,e
 302+ AB4A 7A                                   ld a,d
 303+ AB4B 8C                                   adc a,h
 304+ AB4C 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 305+ AB4E 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 306+ AB4F 79                                   ld a,c
 307+ AB50 CD 6B AB                             call div_fixed88_sub
 308+ AB53 4F                                   ld c,a
 309+ AB54 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 310+ AB55 CD 6B AB                             call div_fixed88_sub
 311+ AB58 51                                   ld d,c
 312+ AB59 5F                                   ld e,a
 313+ AB5A F1                                   pop af
 314+ AB5B F0                                   ret p
 315+ AB5C AF                                   xor a
 316+ AB5D 93                                   sub e
 317+ AB5E 5F                                   ld e,a
 318+ AB5F 9F                                   sbc a,a
 319+ AB60 92                                   sub d
 320+ AB61 57                                   ld d,a
 321+ AB62 C9                                   ret
 322+ AB63
 323+ AB63 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 324+ AB66 F1                                   pop af
 325+ AB67 F0                                   ret p
 326+ AB68 13                                   inc de
 327+ AB69 1C                                   inc e
 328+ AB6A C9                                   ret
 329+ AB6B
 330+ AB6B              ;min: 456cc
 331+ AB6B              ;max: 536cc
 332+ AB6B              ;avg: 496cc
 333+ AB6B 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 334+ AB6D 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 335+ AB6E ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 336+ AB70 19                                   add hl,de
 337+ AB71 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 338+ AB73 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 339+ AB75 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 340+ AB77 8F                                   adc a,a
 341+ AB78 C9                                   ret
 342+ AB79
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1054  AB79                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ AB79              asm_tis2:
   2+ AB79              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ AB79              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ AB79 F5           	push af
   5+ AB7A E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ AB7C 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ AB7D 3A 16 98     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ AB80 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ AB81 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ AB82 BB           	cp e
  11+ AB83 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ AB85 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ AB87 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ AB89 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AB8A 3A 16 98     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ AB8D 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ AB8E CD 66 AA     	call asm_div16
  18+ AB91 F1           	pop af
  19+ AB92 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ AB94 B5           	or l
  21+ AB95 C9           	ret
  22+ AB96              .tis2_set96:
  23+ AB96 F1           	pop af
  24+ AB97 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ AB99 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ AB9B C9           	ret
  27+ AB9C
  28+ AB9C
  29+ AB9C              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ AB9C              squareregfx:
  31+ AB9C 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ AB9F 57           	ld d,a
  33+ ABA0 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ ABA1 ED 30        	mul
  35+ ABA3 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ ABA4              squareregfy:
  37+ ABA4 3A 85 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ ABA7 57           	ld d,a
  39+ ABA8 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ ABA9 ED 30        	mul
  41+ ABAB 19           	add hl,de
  42+ ABAC              squareregfz:
  43+ ABAC 3A 87 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ ABAF 57           	ld d,a
  45+ ABB0 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ ABB1 ED 30        	mul
  47+ ABB3 19           	add hl,de
  48+ ABB4 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ ABB5              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ ABB5 CD 47 A9     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ ABB8 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ ABB9 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ ABBA E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ ABBB              normfx:
  55+ ABBB 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ ABBE E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ ABBF 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ ABC0 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ ABC1 CD 79 AB     	call asm_tis2
  60+ ABC4 32 83 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ ABC7              normfy:
  62+ ABC7 3A 85 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ ABCA E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ ABCB 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ ABCC 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ ABCD CD 79 AB     	call asm_tis2
  67+ ABD0 32 85 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ ABD3              normfz:
  69+ ABD3 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ ABD6 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ ABD7 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ ABD8 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ ABD9 CD 79 AB     	call asm_tis2
  74+ ABDC 32 87 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ ABDF              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ ABDF C9           	ret
  77+ ABE0
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1055  ABE0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ ABE0              ; Input:
   2+ ABE0              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ ABE0              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ ABE0              ; Output:
   5+ ABE0              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ ABE0              ;
   7+ ABE0              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ ABE0              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ ABE0              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ ABE0              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ ABE0              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ ABE0              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ ABE0              ;
  14+ ABE0
  15+ ABE0 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ ABE1 A7                               and     a
  17+ ABE2 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ ABE4 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ ABE5 C9                               ret
  20+ ABE6
  21+ ABE6              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ ABE6              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ ABE6
  24+ ABE6 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ ABE8 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ ABE9 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ ABEB 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ ABEC 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ ABED E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ ABEF 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ ABF0 A7                               and     a
  32+ ABF1 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ ABF3 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ ABF5 C9                               ret
  35+ ABF6
  36+ ABF6
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1056  ABF6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ ABF6              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ ABF6              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ ABF6              negate16:
   4+ ABF6              negate16hl:
   5+ ABF6                      ; Input:
   6+ ABF6                      ;       HL = value
   7+ ABF6                      ; Output:
   8+ ABF6                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ ABF6                      ; Destroys:
  10+ ABF6                      ;       AF
  11+ ABF6                      ;
  12+ ABF6 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ ABF7 95           	sub 	l
  14+ ABF8 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ ABF9 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ ABFA 94           	sub 	h
  17+ ABFB 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ ABFC C9           	ret
  19+ ABFD
  20+ ABFD              negate16de:
  21+ ABFD AF           	xor 	a
  22+ ABFE 93           	sub 	e
  23+ ABFF 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ AC00 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ AC01 92           	sub 	d
  26+ AC02 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ AC03 C9           	ret
  28+ AC04
  29+ AC04              negate16bc:
  30+ AC04 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ AC05 91           	sub 	c
  32+ AC06 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ AC07 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ AC08 90           	sub 	b
  35+ AC09 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ AC0A C9           	ret
  37+ AC0B
  38+ AC0B
  39+ AC0B              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ AC0B ~            					xor 	a
  41+ AC0B ~            					sub 	l
  42+ AC0B ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ AC0B ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ AC0B ~            					sub 	h
  45+ AC0B ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ AC0B              					ENDM
  47+ AC0B
  48+ AC0B              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ AC0B ~            					xor 	a
  50+ AC0B ~                                sub 	e
  51+ AC0B ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ AC0B ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ AC0B ~                                sub 	d
  54+ AC0B ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ AC0B              					ENDM
  56+ AC0B              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ AC0B ~            					xor 	a
  58+ AC0B ~                                sub 	c
  59+ AC0B ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ AC0B ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ AC0B ~                                sub 	b
  62+ AC0B ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ AC0B              					ENDM
  64+ AC0B
  65+ AC0B              macronegate16ix:	MACRO

  67+ AC0B ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ AC0B ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ AC0B ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ AC0B ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ AC0B ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ AC0B              					ENDM
