1057  AC0B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ AC0B DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ AC0D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ AC0D BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AC0E D2 23 AC    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ AC11 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ AC12 CD 58 AA                             call		asm_div8
   5+ AC15 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ AC16 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ AC18 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ AC19 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ AC1B 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ AC1C 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ AC1D DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ AC1F E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ AC21 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ AC22 C9                                   ret
  15+ AC23              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ AC23              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ AC23 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ AC25 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ AC27 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ AC29 C9                                   ret
  21+ AC2A
  22+ AC2A
  23+ AC2A
  24+ AC2A
  25+ AC2A              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ AC2A                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ AC2A 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ AC2D DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ AC2F E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ AC31              N96SQX:
  31+ AC31              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ AC31 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ AC32 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ AC33 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ AC35 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ AC36 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ AC37              N96SQY:
  35+ AC37 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ AC3A DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ AC3C E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ AC3E              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ AC3E 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ AC3F 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ AC40 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ AC42 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ AC43              N96SQZ:
  41+ AC43 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ AC46 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ AC48 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ AC4A              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ AC4A 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ AC4B 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ AC4C ED 30       >			mul
  45+ AC4E              N96SQADD:
  46+ AC4E 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ AC4F EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ AC50              N96SQRT:
  49+ AC50 CD 47 A9     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ AC53              N96NORMX:
  51+ AC53 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ AC56 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ AC58 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ AC59 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ AC5A CD 81 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ AC5D 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ AC5E DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ AC60 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ AC62 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ AC63 32 83 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ AC66              N96NORMY:
  62+ AC66 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ AC69 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ AC6B 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ AC6C 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ AC6D CD 81 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ AC70 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ AC71 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ AC73 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ AC75 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ AC76 32 84 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ AC79              N96NORMZ:
  73+ AC79 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ AC7C E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ AC7E 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ AC7F 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ AC80 CD 81 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ AC83 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ AC84 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ AC86 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ AC88 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ AC89 32 85 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ AC8C C9           	ret
  84+ AC8D
  85+ AC8D              ; Normalise vector
  86+ AC8D              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ AC8D              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ AC8D              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ AC8D              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ AC8D              ;
  91+ AC8D              ;
  92+ AC8D              ;
  93+ AC8D
  94+ AC8D              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ AC8D 3A 83 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ AC90                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ AC90 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ AC91 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ AC92 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ AC94 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ AC95 32 17 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ AC98 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ AC99 32 16 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ AC9C 32 0F 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ AC9F 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ ACA2                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ ACA2 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ ACA3 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ ACA4 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ ACA6 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ ACA7 32 33 98                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ ACAA 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ ACAB 32 0F 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ ACAE 21 16 98                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ ACB1 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ ACB2 32 16 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ ACB5 3A 33 98                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ ACB8 21 17 98                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ ACBB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ ACBC 32 17 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ ACBF 3A 85 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ ACC2                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ ACC2 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ ACC3 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ ACC4 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ ACC6 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ ACC7 32 33 98                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ ACCA 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ ACCB 32 0F 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ ACCE 21 16 98                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ ACD1 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ ACD2 32 16 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ ACD5 3A 33 98                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ ACD8 21 17 98                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ ACDB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ ACDC 32 17 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ ACDF CD 6A A9                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ ACE2 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ ACE5 CD 7B AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ ACE8 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ ACEB 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ ACEE CD 7B AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ ACF1 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ ACF4 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ ACF7 CD 7B AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ ACFA 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ ACFD C9                                   ret
 139+ ACFE
 140+ ACFE
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1058  ACFE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ ACFE              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ ACFE              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ ACFE              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ ACFE              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ ACFE              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ ACFE              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ ACFE              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ ACFE 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ AD01 CD 17 AD     	call	Num1
  10+ AD04 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ AD07 CD 17 AD     	call	Num1
  12+ AD0A 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ AD0D CD 17 AD     	call	Num1
  14+ AD10 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ AD12 CD 17 AD     	call	Num1
  16+ AD15 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ AD17              Num1:
  18+ AD17 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ AD19              .Num2:
  20+ AD19 3C           	inc	a
  21+ AD1A 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ AD1B 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ AD1D ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ AD1F 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ AD20 13           	inc	de
  26+ AD21 C9           	ret
  27+ AD22
  28+ AD22              DispAtoDE:
  29+ AD22 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ AD24 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ AD25 C3 FE AC     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ AD28
  33+ AD28              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ AD28 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ AD2A 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ AD2B 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ AD2E CD 3E AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ AD31 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ AD33 CD 17 AD     	call	Num1
  40+ AD36 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ AD38 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ AD39 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ AD3A 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ AD3C 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ AD3E              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ AD3E 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ AD40              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ AD40 3C           	inc	a
  49+ AD41 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ AD42 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ AD44 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ AD46 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ AD48              .Blank:
  54+ AD48 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ AD4A              .DontBlank:
  56+ AD4A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ AD4C 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ AD4D 13           	inc	de
  59+ AD4E C9           	ret
  60+ AD4F
  61+ AD4F              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ AD4F FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ AD51 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ AD53 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ AD55 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ AD56 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ AD59 CD 65 AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ AD5C 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ AD5E CD 65 AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ AD61 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ AD63 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ AD65              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ AD65 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ AD67              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ AD67 3C           	inc	a
  76+ AD68 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ AD69 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ AD6B FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ AD6D 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ AD6F              .Blank:
  81+ AD6F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ AD71              .DontBlank:
  83+ AD71 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ AD73 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ AD74 13           	inc	de
  86+ AD75 C9           	ret
  87+ AD76              .NoStock:
  88+ AD76 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ AD78 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ AD79 13           	inc	de
  91+ AD7A 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ AD7B 13           	inc	de
  93+ AD7C 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ AD7E 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ AD7F 13           	inc de
  96+ AD80 C9           	ret
  97+ AD81
  98+ AD81
  99+ AD81              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ AD81              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ AD81              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ AD81              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ AD81 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ AD85 0A 00 00 00
 103+ AD89 64 00 00 00
 103+ AD8D E8 03 00 00
 103+ AD91 10 27 00 00
 104+ AD95 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ AD99 40 42 0F 00
 104+ AD9D 80 96 98 00
 104+ ADA1 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ ADA5 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ ADA9 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ ADAD
 107+ ADAD              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ ADAD CD BC AD     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ ADB0 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ ADB3 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ ADB6 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ ADB8 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ ADBB C9                                   ret
 114+ ADBC
 115+ ADBC DD 22 A9 AD  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ ADC0 ED 53 AB AD                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ ADC4 DD 21 A5 AD                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ ADC8 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ ADCA 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ ADCC 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ ADCE B7                                   or a
 122+ ADCF DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ ADD2 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ ADD5 2A A9 AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ ADD8 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ ADDA 22 A9 AD                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ ADDD DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ ADE0 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ ADE3 2A AB AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ ADE6 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ ADE8 22 AB AD                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ ADEB 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ ADED 0C                                   inc c
 134+ ADEE 3C                                   inc a
 135+ ADEF 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ ADF1 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ ADF4 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ ADF7 2A A9 AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ ADFA 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ ADFB 22 A9 AD                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ ADFE DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ AE01 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ AE04 2A AB AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ AE07 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ AE09 22 AB AD                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ AE0C 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ AE0F DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ AE11 0C                                   inc c
 149+ AE12 0D                                   dec c
 150+ AE13 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ AE15 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ AE18 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ AE1A 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ AE1C 3A A9 AD                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ AE1F C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ AE21 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ AE24 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ AE28 C9                                   ret
 159+ AE29
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1059  AE29                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ AE29              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ AE29              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ AE29              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ AE29 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ AE2A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ AE2C A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ AE2D                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ AE2D FA 3B AE    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ AE30 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ AE31 B1                                   or      c
  10+ AE32                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ AE32 FA 37 AE    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ AE35 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ AE36 C9                                   ret
  13+ AE37 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ AE38 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ AE39 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ AE3A C9                                   ret
  17+ AE3B B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ AE3C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ AE3E 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ AE40 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ AE41 C9                                   ret
  22+ AE42              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ AE42 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ AE43 95          >                    sub l
  22+ AE44 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ AE45 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ AE46 94          >                    sub h
  22+ AE47 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ AE48 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ AE49 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ AE4B C9                                   ret
  26+ AE4C
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1060  AE4C              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1061  AE4C              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1062  AE4C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ AE4C              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ AE4C BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ AE4D D2 68 AE    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ AE50 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ AE52 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ AE54                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ AE54 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ AE55 DA 6B AE    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ AE58 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ AE59 37                                   scf
   7+ AE5A CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ AE5C 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ AE5E 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ AE5F CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ AE61 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ AE63 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ AE64 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ AE66 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ AE67 C9                                   ret
  16+ AE68 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ AE6A C9                                   ret
  18+ AE6B B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ AE6C CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ AE6E 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ AE70 C3 5E AE                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ AE73
  23+ AE73
  24+ AE73              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ AE73              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ AE73              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ AE73 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ AE75 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ AE77 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ AE79 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ AE7B              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ AE7B              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ AE7B              TIS2:
  34+ AE7B 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ AE7C 3A 16 98     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ AE7F 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ AE80 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ AE81              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ AE81 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ AE82 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ AE84              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ AE84 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ AE85 D2 A5 AE    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ AE88 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ AE8A              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ AE8A CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ AE8C              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ AE8C BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ AE8D DA AB AE    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ AE90 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ AE91 37           	scf
  48+ AE92 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ AE94 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ AE96              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ AE96 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ AE97 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ AE99 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ AE9B 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ AE9C CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ AE9E 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ AE9F 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ AEA0 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ AEA1 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ AEA3 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ AEA4 C9           	ret
  62+ AEA5              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ AEA5              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ AEA5 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ AEA6 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ AEA8 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ AEAA C9           	ret
  68+ AEAB              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ AEAB B7           	or			a
  70+ AEAC CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ AEAE 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ AEB0 C3 96 AE     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ AEB3
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1063  AEB3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ AEB3              fmltu:
   2+ AEB3              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ AEB3              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ AEB3 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ AEB4 3A 16 98     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ AEB7 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AEB8 ED 30        	mul
   8+ AEBA 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ AEBB C9           	ret
  10+ AEBC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1064  AEBC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ AEBC              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ AEBC              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ AEBC 21 EF 9A     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ AEBF FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ AEC1 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ AEC3 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ AEC4 C3 D0 AE     		jp		DV41
   8+ AEC7              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ AEC7 21 EF 9A     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ AECA 3A FD 96     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ AECD ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ AECF 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ AED0              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ AED0 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ AED1 3A 12 98     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ AED4              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ AED4 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ AED6 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ AED8 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ AED9 AF           		xor		a
  21+ AEDA              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ AEDA CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ AEDC 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ AEDE BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ AEDF 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ AEE1              DV8:
  27+ AEE1 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ AEE2 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ AEE3              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ AEE3 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ AEE5 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ AEE7              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ AEE7              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ AEE7 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ AEE9 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ AEEA              .RollRemainder:
  37+ AEEA CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ AEEC 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ AEEE B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ AEEF 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ AEF1              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ AEF1 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ AEF2              .DontSBC:
  44+ AEF2 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ AEF4 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ AEF6 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ AEF7 32 17 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ AEFA 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ AEFB 32 0F 97     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ AEFE C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ AEFF              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ AEFF 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ AF00 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ AF01 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ AF03 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ AF05 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ AF06 32 17 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ AF09 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ AF0A 32 0F 97     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ AF0D C9           		ret
  61+ AF0E              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ AF0E 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ AF10 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ AF11 32 17 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ AF14 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ AF15 32 0F 97     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ AF18 C9           		ret
  68+ AF19
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1065  AF19                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ AF19
   2+ AF19              asm_defmutl:
   3+ AF19              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ AF19              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ AF19 ED 30        	mul
   6+ AF1B 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ AF1C C9           	ret
   8+ AF1D
   9+ AF1D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1066  AF1D              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1067  AF1D              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1068  AF1D              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1069  AF1D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ AF1D              APequQmulA:
   2+ AF1D              asm_mult1:
   3+ AF1D              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ AF1D FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ AF1F 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ AF21 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AF22 3A 16 98     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ AF25 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ AF26 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ AF28 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ AF2A AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ AF2B E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ AF2D 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ AF2E 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ AF2F E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ AF31 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ AF32 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ AF33 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ AF35 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ AF36 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ AF38 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ AF39 32 0F 97     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ AF3C 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ AF3D B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ AF3E 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ AF3F C9           	ret
  27+ AF40              .mul0:
  28+ AF40 AF           	xor	a
  29+ AF41 32 0F 97     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ AF44 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ AF45 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ AF46 C9           	ret
  33+ AF47
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1070  AF47                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ AF47              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ AF47              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ AF47              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ AF47              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ AF47              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ AF47              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ AF47              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ AF47              LL38:
   9+ AF47              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ AF47              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ AF47              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ AF47              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ AF47              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ AF47              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ AF47              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ AF47              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ AF47              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ AF47              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ AF47              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ AF47              ;	ret
  21+ AF47              ; calculation table
  22+ AF47              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ AF47              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ AF47              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ AF47              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ AF47              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ AF47              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ AF47              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ AF47              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ AF47              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ AF47
  32+ AF47              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ AF47              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ AF47              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ AF47              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ AF47
  37+ AF47
  38+ AF47              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ AF47 21 18 98     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ AF4A AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ AF4B FA 56 AF     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ AF4E 3A 16 98     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ AF51 21 17 98     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ AF54 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ AF55 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ AF56              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ AF56 3A 17 98     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ AF59 21 16 98     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ AF5C              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ AF5C              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ AF5C B7          >                        or a
  51+ AF5D 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ AF5E 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ AF60              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ AF60              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ AF60              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ AF60 C9           	ret
  57+ AF61              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ AF61 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ AF63 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ AF65 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ AF67 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ AF68 3A 18 98     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ AF6B EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ AF6D 32 18 98     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ AF70 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ AF71                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ AF71 B7          >                        or a
  67+ AF72 C9           	ret
  68+ AF73              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ AF73 32 18 98         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ AF76                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ AF76 B7          >                        or a
  71+ AF77 C9               ret
  72+ AF78              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ AF78              ;--	push	bc
  74+ AF78              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ AF78              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ AF78              ;--	sub		b
  77+ AF78              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ AF78              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ AF78              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ AF78              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ AF78              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ AF78              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ AF78              ;--	ret
  84+ AF78
  85+ AF78              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ AF78              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ AF78              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ AF78              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ AF78              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ AF78              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ AF78              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ AF78              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ AF78              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ AF78              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ AF78              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ AF78              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ AF78              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ AF78              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ AF78              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ AF78              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ AF78              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ AF78              ;;;;	ret
 109+ AF78              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ AF78              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ AF78              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ AF78              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ AF78              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ AF78              ;;;;	ret
 117+ AF78              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ AF78              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ AF78              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ AF78              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ AF78              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ AF78              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ AF78              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ AF78              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ AF78              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ AF78              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ AF78              ;;;;	ret
 134+ AF78              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ AF78              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ AF78              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ AF78              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ AF78              ;;;;	ret
 141+ AF78
 142+ AF78
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1071  AF78                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ AF78              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ AF78              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ AF78              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ AF78
   5+ AF78
   6+ AF78              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ AF78 3A FD 96     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ AF7B 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ AF7C              moveship4breg:
  10+ AF7C              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ AF7C              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ AF7C              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ AF7C 3A 2C 97     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ AF7F 32 16 98     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ AF82 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ AF85 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ AF86 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ AF88 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ AF89 32 17 98     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ AF8C 23           		inc		hl
  21+ AF8D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ AF8E 32 18 98     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ AF91 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ AF92 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ AF93 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ AF94 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ AF95 32 0F 97     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ AF98 23           		inc		hl
  29+ AF99 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ AF9A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ AF9C CD 1D A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ AF9F 23                   inc     hl
  33+ AFA0 23                   inc     hl
  34+ AFA1 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ AFA2 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ AFA3 3A FC 96             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ AFA6 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ AFA7 32 0F 97             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ AFAA 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ AFAB 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ AFAC 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ AFAD 32 17 98             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ AFB0 23                   inc     hl
  44+ AFB1 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ AFB2 32 18 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ AFB5 23                   inc     hl
  47+ AFB6 23                   inc     hl
  48+ AFB7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ AFB8 CD 1D A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ AFBB 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ AFBC 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ AFBD 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ AFBE 3A FC 96             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ AFC1 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ AFC2 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ AFC3 32 0F 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ AFC6 3A 1B 97             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ AFC9 32 16 98             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ AFCC 23                   inc     hl
  60+ AFCD 23                   inc     hl
  61+ AFCE 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ AFCF 32 17 98             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ AFD2 23                   inc     hl
  64+ AFD3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ AFD4 32 18 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ AFD7 23                   inc     hl
  67+ AFD8 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ AFD9 32 0F 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ AFDC 23                   inc     hl
  70+ AFDD 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ AFDE EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ AFE0 CD 1D A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ AFE3 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ AFE4 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ AFE5 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ AFE6 3A FC 96             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ AFE9 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ AFEA 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ AFEB 32 0F 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ AFEE 23                   inc     hl
  81+ AFEF 23                   inc     hl
  82+ AFF0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ AFF1 32 17 98             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ AFF4 23                   inc     hl
  85+ AFF5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ AFF6 32 18 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ AFF9 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ AFFA 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ AFFB 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ AFFC CD 1D A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ AFFF 23                   inc     hl
  92+ B000 23                   inc     hl
  93+ B001 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ B002 3A FC 96             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ B005 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ B006 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ B007 C9                   ret
  98+ B008
  99+ B008
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
1072  B008              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
1073  B008              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
1074  B008              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
1075  B008              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
1076  B008                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B008              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B008              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B008              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B008              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B008              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B008              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B008              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B008              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B008              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B008              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B008              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B008              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B008              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B008              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B008              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B008              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B008              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B008              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B008              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B008              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B008              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B008              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B008              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B008              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B008              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B008              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B008              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B008              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B008              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B008              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B008              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B008              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B008              ;;;	ret
  34+ B008              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B008              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B008              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B008              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B008              ;;;	ret
  39+ B008
  40+ B008              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B008 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B009 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B00A 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B00C              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B00C 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B00D B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B00E C8             ret z
  48+ B00F 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B012 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B014              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B014 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B016 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B017 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B019 C9             ret
  55+ B01A
  56+ B01A              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B01A              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B01A              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B01A              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B01A 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B01C AF                   xor a
  62+ B01D              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B01D 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B01E 17                   rla
  65+ B01F B9                   cp c
  66+ B020 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B022 91                   sub c
  68+ B023 2C                   inc l
  69+ B024              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B024 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B026 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B027 32 17 98             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B02A C9                   ret
  74+ B02B
  75+ B02B
  76+ B02B
  77+ B02B              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B02B              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B02B              BFRDIV:
  80+ B02B F5           		push	af
  81+ B02C 3A 16 98     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B02F 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B030 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B031 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B033 CA 4A B0     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B036              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B036 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B038 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B039              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B039 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B03B AF           		xor a
  92+ B03C              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B03C 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B03D 17           		rla
  95+ B03E B9           		cp c
  96+ B03F 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B041 2C           		inc l
  98+ B042 91           		sub c
  99+ B043              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B043 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B045 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B046 32 17 98     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B049 C9           		ret
 104+ B04A              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B04A 32 17 98     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B04D C9           		ret
 107+ B04E              ;	push	af
 108+ B04E              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B04E              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B04E              ;	pop		af
 111+ B04E              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B04E              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B04E              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B04E              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B04E              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B04E              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B04E              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B04E              ;	sla		a
 119+ B04E              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B04E              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B04E              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B04E              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B04E              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B04E              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B04E              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B04E              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B04E              ;	scf
 128+ B04E              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B04E              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B04E              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B04E              ;LL2:
 132+ B04E              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B04E              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B04E              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B04E              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B04E              ;	ret
 137+ B04E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1077  B04E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B04E              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B04E              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B04E              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B04E 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B04F 3A 16 98     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B052 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B054 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B056 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B057 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B059 AF               xor a
  11+ B05A              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B05A CB 21            sla c
  13+ B05C 17               rla
  14+ B05D BA               cp d
  15+ B05E 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B060 0C               inc c
  17+ B061 92               sub d
  18+ B062              LL64:
  19+ B062 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B064 32 15 98     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B067 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B068 32 17 98     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B06B C9               ret
  24+ B06C              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B06C 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B06E 32 17 98     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B071 32 15 98     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B074 C9           	ret
  29+ B075
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   4+ B075 CD 1D AF     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B078 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B079 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B07A 32 18 98     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B07D 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B07E 32 17 98     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B081 08           	ex 	af,af'

  32+ B0F5
  33+ B0F5              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B0F5              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B0F5              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B0F5 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B0F6 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B0F7 32 16 98     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B0FA 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B0FB EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B0FD CD 1D A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B100              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B100              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B100              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B100 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B101 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B103 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B104 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B105 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B107 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B109              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B109 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B10B              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B10B FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B10D DA 1A B1    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B110 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B112 37           		scf
  56+ B113 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B115 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B117              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B117 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B118 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B119 C9           		ret
  62+ B11A              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B11A B7           	or			a
  64+ B11B CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B11D 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B11F C3 17 B1     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B122
  68+ B122              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B122              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B122
  71+ B122
  72+ B122
  73+ B122
  74+ B122              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B122 CD 4D B2     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B125 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B128 C3 5E B1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B12B
  79+ B12B              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B12B AF           		xor		a
  81+ B12C 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B12D 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B130 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B132 CA 22 B1     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B135 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B138 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B139 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B13C CD 13 B2     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B13F 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B142 C3 5E B1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B145              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B145              TIDY:
  93+ B145 DD 01                break
  94+ B147              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B147              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B147 CD 83 B0     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B14A CD 2A AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B14D CD BC B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B150              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B150 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B153 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B155 CA 2B B1     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B158              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B158 CD D9 B1             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B15B 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B15E              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B15E CD 96 B0     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B161 CD 2A AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B164              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B164 CD CF B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B167 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B16A 32 16 98     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B16D 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B170 CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B173 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B176 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B177 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B17A CD F5 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B17D                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B17D A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B17E CA 83 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B181 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B183              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B183 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B186              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B186 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B189 32 16 98     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B18C 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B18F CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B192 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B195 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B196 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B199 CD F5 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B19C                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B19C A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B19D CA A2 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B1A0 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B1A2              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B1A2 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B1A5              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B1A5 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B1A8 32 16 98     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B1AB 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B1AE CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B1B1 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B1B4 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B1B5 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B1B8 CD F5 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B1BB                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B1BB A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B1BC CA C1 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B1BF EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B1C1              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B1C1 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B1C4              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B1C4 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B1C7 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B1C9 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B1CA              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B1CA 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B1CB 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B1CC 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B1CD 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B1CF CD A9 B0     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B1D2 CD 2A AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B1D5              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B1D5 CD E2 B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B1D8
 163+ B1D8 C9           		ret
 164+ B1D9
 165+ B1D9
 166+ B1D9
 167+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B1D9              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B1D9
 239+ B1D9
 240+ B1D9              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B1D9              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 242+ B1D9              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B1D9 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B1DC 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B1DF 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B1E2 CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B1E5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B1E5 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B1E8 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B1EB 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B1EE CD 1D A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B1F1 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B1F2 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B1F4 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B1F6              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B1F6 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B1F9 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B1FA E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B1FC FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B1FE FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B200 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B201 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B203 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B204 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 261+ B205 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B206 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B208 CD 9C AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B20B FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B20D EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B20F E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B211 B0           		or		b
 268+ B212 C9           		ret
 269+ B213
 270+ B213
 271+ B213              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B213              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 273+ B213              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B213 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B216 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B219 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B21C CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B21F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B21F 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B222 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B225 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B228 CD 1D A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B22B 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B22C E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B22E FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B230 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B233 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B234 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B236 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B238 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B23A 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B23B E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B23D 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B23E 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 291+ B23F 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B240 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B242 CD 9C AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B245 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B247 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B249 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B24B B0           		or		b
 298+ B24C C9           		ret
 299+ B24D
 300+ B24D              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B24D              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 302+ B24D              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B24D 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B250 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B253 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B256 CD 75 B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B259              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B259 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B25C 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B25F 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B262 CD 1D A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B265 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B266 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B268 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B26A 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B26D 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B26E E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B270 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B272 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B274 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B275 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B277 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B278 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 320+ B279 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B27A 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B27C CD 9C AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B27F FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B281 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B283 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B285 B0           		or		b
 327+ B286 C9           		ret
 328+ B287
 329+ B287
 330+ B287
 331+ B287              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B287              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B287              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B287              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B287              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B287              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B287              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B287              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B287              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B287              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B287              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B287              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B287              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B287              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B287              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B287              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B287              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B287              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B287              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B287              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B287              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B287              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B287              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B287              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B287              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B287              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B287
 377+ B287
 378+ B287
 379+ B287
 380+ B287
 381+ B287
 382+ B287              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B287              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B287              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ B287              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
