 136+ CA2E              UBnkShipCopy                equ UBnkHullVerticies               ; Buffer for copy of ship data, for speed will copy to a local memory block, Cobra is around 400 bytes on creation of a new ship so should be plenty
 137+ CA2E              UBnk_Data_len               EQU $ - StartOfUniv
 138+ CA2E
 139+ CA2E              ZeroUnivPitchAndRoll:   MACRO
 140+ CA2E ~                                    xor     a
 141+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 142+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 143+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 144+ CA2E
 145+ CA2E              MaxUnivPitchAndRoll:    MACRO
 146+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,127
 147+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 148+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 149+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 150+ CA2E
 151+ CA2E              RandomUnivPitchAndRoll: MACRO
 152+ CA2E ~                                    call    doRandom
 153+ CA2E ~                                    or      %01101111
 154+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 155+ CA2E ~                                    call    doRandom
 156+ CA2E ~                                    or      %01101111
 157+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 158+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 159+ CA2E
 160+ CA2E              RandomUnivSpeed:        MACRO
 161+ CA2E ~                                    call    doRandom
 162+ CA2E ~                                    and     31
 163+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKspeed),a
 164+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 165+ CA2E
 166+ CA2E              MaxUnivSpeed:           MACRO
 167+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,31
 168+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKspeed),a
 169+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 170+ CA2E
 171+ CA2E              ZeroUnivAccelleration:  MACRO
 172+ CA2E ~                                    xor     a
 173+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 174+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 175+ CA2E
 176+ CA2E              AequN1xorN2:            MACRO  param1,param2
 177+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,(param1)
 178+ CA2E ~                                    xor     param2
 179+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 180+ CA2E
 181+ CA2E              N0equN1byN2div256:      MACRO param1,param2,param3
 182+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,param3                        ;
 183+ CA2E ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 184+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,param2                        ; A = XX16 element
 185+ CA2E ~                                    ld      d,a
 186+ CA2E ~                                    mul
 187+ CA2E ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 188+ CA2E ~                                    ld      (param1),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 189+ CA2E                                      ENDM
 190+ CA2E
 191+ CA2E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 192+ CA2E 21 00 C0     ResetUBnkData:          ld      hl,StartOfUniv
 193+ CA31 11 2E 0A                             ld      de,UBnk_Data_len
 194+ CA34 AF                                   xor     a
 195+ CA35 CD D2 93                             call    memfill_dma
 196+ CA38 C9                                   ret
 197+ CA39              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 198+ CA39 21 0C C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 199+ CA3C 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 200+ CA3E AF                                   xor     a
 201+ CA3F 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 202+ CA40 23                                   inc     hl
 203+ CA41 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 204+ CA43 C9                                   ret
 205+ CA44
 206+ CA44              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 207+ CA44              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 208+ CA44 CD 71 CC     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialiseOrientation           ; Player  facing
 209+ CA47 CD 39 CA                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 210+ CA4A 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight
 211+ CA4C 32 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a
 212+ CA4F 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 213+ CA51 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 214+ CA54                                      MaxUnivSpeed
 214+ CA54 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 214+ CA56 32 31 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKspeed),a
 215+ CA59 C9                                   ret
 216+ CA5A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 217+ CA5A              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 218+ CA5A 3A D6 98     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 219+ CA5D 47                                   ld      b,a
 220+ CA5E 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UbnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 221+ CA61 90                                   sub     b
 222+ CA62 C3 6B CA                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 223+ CA65 18 04                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 224+ CA67 32 3A C0                             ld      (UbnKEnergy),a
 225+ CA6A C9                                   ret
 226+ CA6B              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 227+ CA6B              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd
 228+ CA6B 3A 37 C0     UnivExplodeShip:        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 229+ CA6E F6 20                                or      ShipExploding
 230+ CA70 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear
 231+ CA72 32 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 232+ CA75 AF                                   xor     a
 233+ CA76 32 3A C0                             ld      (UbnKEnergy),a
 234+ CA79                                      ;TODO
 235+ CA79 C9                                   ret
 236+ CA7A
 237+ CA7A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 238+ CA7A              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 239+ CA7A CD 71 CC     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 240+ CA7D                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 240+ CA7D CD A6 9C    >                        call    doRandom
 240+ CA80 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 240+ CA82 32 33 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 240+ CA85 CD A6 9C    >                        call    doRandom
 240+ CA88 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 240+ CA8A 32 34 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 241+ CA8D CD A6 9C                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 242+ CA90 32 0C C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 243+ CA93 32 0F C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 244+ CA96 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 245+ CA97 47                                   ld      b,a
 246+ CA98 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 247+ CA9A 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 248+ CA9D 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 249+ CA9E 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 250+ CA9F 47                                   ld      b,a
 251+ CAA0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 252+ CAA2 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 253+ CAA5 CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 254+ CAA7 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 255+ CAA8 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 256+ CAAA 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 257+ CAAD CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 258+ CAAF 78                                   ld      a,b
 259+ CAB0 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 260+ CAB2 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 261+ CAB3 32 0D C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 262+ CAB6 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 263+ CAB8 98                                   sbc     b
 264+ CAB9 99                                   sbc     c
 265+ CABA 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 266+ CABD              .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ReturnIfMemEquN ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeJunk
 266+ CABD 3A 22 C3    >                        ld     a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 266+ CAC0 FE 03       >                        cp     ShipTypeJunk
 266+ CAC2 C0          >                        ret    nz
 267+ CAC3 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 268+ CAC4 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 269+ CAC5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 270+ CAC7 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 271+ CACA C9                                   ret
 272+ CACB
 273+ CACB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 274+ CACB              ; This sets current univrse object to space station
 275+ CACB 3E 81        ResetStationLaunch:     ld  a,%10000001
 276+ CACD 32 37 C0                             ld  (UBnkaiatkecm),a                    ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 277+ CAD0 AF                                   xor a
 278+ CAD1 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 279+ CAD4 32 23 C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 280+ CAD7 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 281+ CAD9 32 33 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 282+ CADC 21 00 00     .SetPosBehindUs:        ld      hl,$0000
 283+ CADF 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 284+ CAE2 21 00 00                             ld      hl,$0000
 285+ CAE5 22 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 286+ CAE8 21 B0 01                             ld      hl,$01B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 287+ CAEB 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 288+ CAEE AF                                   xor     a
 289+ CAEF 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 290+ CAF2 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 291+ CAF5 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 292+ CAF7 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 293+ CAFA CD 96 CC     .SetOrientation:        call    LaunchedOrientation             ; set initial facing
 294+ CAFD C9                                   ret
 295+ CAFE                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 296+ CAFE              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 297+ CAFE
 298+ CAFE              ; Initialiase data, iyh must equal slot number
 299+ CAFE              ;                   iyl must be ship type
 300+ CAFE 32 2C C0     UnivInitRuntime:        ld      (UbnKShipBankNbr),a
 301+ CB01 01 10 00                             ld      bc,UBnKRuntimeSize
 302+ CB04 21 2B C0                             ld      hl,UBnKShipType
 303+ CB07                                      ZeroA
 303+ CB07 AF          >                        xor a
 304+ CB08 77           .InitLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 305+ CB09 23                                   inc     hl
 306+ CB0A 10 FC                                djnz    .InitLoop
 307+ CB0C FD 7C        .SetBankData:           ld      a,iyh
 308+ CB0E 32 2C C0                             ld      (UbnKShipBankNbr),a
 309+ CB11 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 310+ CB13 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnKShipType),a
 311+ CB16 CD 0F E0                             call    GetShipBankId                ; this will mostly be debugging info
 312+ CB19 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkShipModelBank),a        ; this will mostly be debugging info
 313+ CB1C 78                                   ld      a,b                          ; this will mostly be debugging info
 314+ CB1D 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkShipModelNbr),a         ; this will mostly be debugging info
 315+ CB20 C9                                   ret
 316+ CB21
 317+ CB21
 318+ CB21 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 319+ CB22 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 320+ CB24 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 321+ CB25 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 322+ CB26                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 322+ CB26 FA 3E CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 323+ CB29 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 324+ CB2A B2                                   or      d
 325+ CB2B                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 325+ CB2B FA 30 CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 326+ CB2E 19                                   add     hl,de
 327+ CB2F C9                                   ret
 328+ CB30 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 329+ CB31 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 330+ CB33 67                                   ld      h,a
 331+ CB34 7A                                   ld      a,d
 332+ CB35 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 333+ CB37 57                                   ld      d,a
 334+ CB38 19                                   add     hl,de
 335+ CB39 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 336+ CB3B B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 337+ CB3C 67                                   ld      h,a
 338+ CB3D C9                                   ret
 339+ CB3E 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 340+ CB3F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 341+ CB41 67                                   ld      h,a
 342+ CB42 7A                                   ld      a,d
 343+ CB43 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 344+ CB45 57                                   ld      d,a
 345+ CB46 B7                                   or      a
 346+ CB47 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 347+ CB49 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 348+ CB4B 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 349+ CB4C B4                                   or      h
 350+ CB4D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 351+ CB4E C9                                   ret
 352+ CB4F              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 352+ CB4F AF          >                    xor a
 352+ CB50 95          >                    sub l
 352+ CB51 6F          >                    ld l,a
 352+ CB52 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 352+ CB53 94          >                    sub h
 352+ CB54 67          >                    ld h,a
 353+ CB55 78                                   ld      a,b
 354+ CB56 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 355+ CB58 B4                                   or      h
 356+ CB59 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 357+ CB5A C9                                   ret
 358+ CB5B
 359+ CB5B              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 360+ CB5B 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 361+ CB5C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 362+ CB5E 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 363+ CB5F AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 364+ CB60                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 364+ CB60 FA 8E CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 365+ CB63 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 366+ CB64 B2                                   or      d
 367+ CB65                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 367+ CB65 FA 6F CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 368+ CB68 B7                                   or      a
 369+ CB69 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 370+ CB6B                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 370+ CB6B FA 82 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 371+ CB6E C9                                   ret
 372+ CB6F 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 373+ CB70 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 374+ CB72 67                                   ld      h,a
 375+ CB73 7A                                   ld      a,d
 376+ CB74 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 377+ CB76 57                                   ld      d,a
 378+ CB77 B7                                   or      a
 379+ CB78 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 380+ CB7A                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 380+ CB7A FA 82 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 381+ CB7D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 382+ CB7E F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 383+ CB80 67                                   ld      h,a
 384+ CB81 C9                                   ret
 385+ CB82              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 385+ CB82 AF          >                    xor a
 385+ CB83 95          >                    sub l
 385+ CB84 6F          >                    ld l,a
 385+ CB85 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 385+ CB86 94          >                    sub h
 385+ CB87 67          >                    ld h,a
 386+ CB88 78                                   ld      a,b
 387+ CB89 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 388+ CB8B B4                                   or      h
 389+ CB8C 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 390+ CB8D C9                                   ret
 391+ CB8E B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 392+ CB8F 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 393+ CB90 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 394+ CB92 67                                   ld      h,a
 395+ CB93 7A                                   ld      a,d
 396+ CB94 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 397+ CB96 57                                   ld      d,a
 398+ CB97 19                                   add     hl,de
 399+ CB98 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 400+ CB99 B4                                   or      h
 401+ CB9A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 402+ CB9B C9                                   ret
 403+ CB9C
 404+ CB9C
 405+ CB9C              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 405+ CB9C CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 405+ CB9E C2 AF CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 406+ CBA1              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 406+ CBA1 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 406+ CBA3 C2 AF CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 407+ CBA6 ED 52        SBCHLDEhlPosDePos:      sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 408+ CBA8 C9                                   ret
 409+ CBA9 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlPosDeNeg:      res     7,d
 410+ CBAB 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 411+ CBAC CB FA                                set     7,d
 412+ CBAE C9                                   ret
 413+ CBAF CB BC        SBCHLDEhlNeg:           res     7,h
 414+ CBB1                                      JumpOnBitSet d,7,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 414+ CBB1 CB 7A       >                        bit 	7,d
 414+ CBB3 C2 BB CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 415+ CBB6 ED 52        SBCHLDEhlNegdePos:      sbc     hl,de                       ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 416+ CBB8 CB FC                                set     7,h
 417+ CBBA C9                                   ret
 418+ CBBB CB BA        SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 419+ CBBD 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 420+ CBBE CB FA                                set     7,d
 421+ CBC0 CB FC                                set     7,h
 422+ CBC2 C9                                   ret
 423+ CBC3
 424+ CBC3              ; Roate around axis
 425+ CBC3              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 426+ CBC3              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 427+ CBC3              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 428+ CBC3              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 429+ CBC3              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 430+ CBC3              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 431+ CBC3              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 432+ CBC3              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 433+ CBC3              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 434+ CBC3 2A F8 96     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 435+ CBC6 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 436+ CBC7 23                                   inc     hl
 437+ CBC8 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 438+ CBC9 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 439+ CBCA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 440+ CBCB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 441+ CBCD FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 442+ CBCF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 443+ CBD0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 444+ CBD2 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 445+ CBD4 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 446+ CBD5 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 447+ CBD7 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 448+ CBD8 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 449+ CBD9 CD 5B CB                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 450+ CBDC              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451+ CBDC E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 452+ CBDD 7D                                   ld      a,l
 453+ CBDE 32 17 98                             ld      (varR),a
 454+ CBE1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 455+ CBE2 32 18 98                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 456+ CBE5              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 457+ CBE5 2A FA 96                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 458+ CBE8 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 459+ CBE9 23                                   inc     hl
 460+ CBEA 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 461+ CBEB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 462+ CBEC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 463+ CBEE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 464+ CBF0 7A                                   ld      a,d
 465+ CBF1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 466+ CBF3 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 467+ CBF4                                      ShiftDERight1
 467+ CBF4 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 467+ CBF6 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 468+ CBF8                                      ShiftDERight1
 468+ CBF8 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 468+ CBFA CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 469+ CBFC                                      ShiftDERight1
 469+ CBFC CB 3A       >			   srl d
 469+ CBFE CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 470+ CC00                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 470+ CC00 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 470+ CC02 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 471+ CC04 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 472+ CC07 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 473+ CC09 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 474+ CC0B B2                                   or      d
 475+ CC0C 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 476+ CC0D              ;;; ld      a,e
 477+ CC0D              ;;;     or      iyh
 478+ CC0D              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 479+ CC0D              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 480+ CC0D E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 481+ CC0E                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 482+ CC0E              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 483+ CC0E CD 21 CB                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 484+ CC11 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 485+ CC12              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 486+ CC12              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 487+ CC12 2A FA 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 488+ CC15 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 489+ CC16 23                               inc     hl
 490+ CC17 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 491+ CC18 EB                               ex      de,hl
 492+ CC19 7C                               ld      a,h
 493+ CC1A E6 80                            and     $80
 494+ CC1C FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 495+ CC1E 7C                               ld      a,h
 496+ CC1F E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 497+ CC21 CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 498+ CC23 5F                               ld      e,a
 499+ CC24 FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 500+ CC26 57                               ld      d,a
 501+ CC27 B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 502+ CC28 CD 5B CB                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 503+ CC2B              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 504+ CC2B E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 505+ CC2C 7D                               ld      a,l
 506+ CC2D 32 0F 97                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 507+ CC30 7C                               ld      a,h
 508+ CC31 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 509+ CC33 32 33 98                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 510+ CC36              ;-- Set up TQ
 511+ CC36 2A F8 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 512+ CC39              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 513+ CC39 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 514+ CC3A 23                               inc     hl
 515+ CC3B 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 516+ CC3C 7A                               ld      a,d
 517+ CC3D E6 80                            and     $80
 518+ CC3F FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 519+ CC41 7A                               ld      a,d
 520+ CC42 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 521+ CC44 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 522+ CC45                                  ShiftDERight1
 522+ CC45 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 522+ CC47 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 523+ CC49                                  ShiftDERight1
 523+ CC49 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 523+ CC4B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 524+ CC4D                                  ShiftDERight1
 524+ CC4D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 524+ CC4F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 525+ CC51                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 525+ CC51 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 525+ CC53 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 526+ CC55 3A 3C C0                         ld      a,(univRAT2)
 527+ CC58 FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 528+ CC5A E6 80                            and     $80
 529+ CC5C B2                               or      d
 530+ CC5D 57                               ld      d,a
 531+ CC5E              ;;; ld      a,e
 532+ CC5E              ;;;     or      iyh
 533+ CC5E              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 534+ CC5E E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 535+ CC5F              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 536+ CC5F CD 5B CB                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 537+ CC62              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 538+ CC62 EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 539+ CC63 2A FA 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 540+ CC66 73                               ld      (hl),e
 541+ CC67 23                               inc     hl
 542+ CC68 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 543+ CC69              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 544+ CC69 D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 545+ CC6A 2A F8 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 546+ CC6D 73                               ld      (hl),e
 547+ CC6E 23                               inc     hl
 548+ CC6F 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 549+ CC70 C9                               ret
 550+ CC71
 551+ CC71                                  include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++CC71              InitialiseOrientation:
   2++CC71              ZI1:
   3++CC71              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   4++CC71              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   5++CC71              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   6++CC71 21 00 00         ld      hl, 0
   7++CC74 22 17 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++CC77 22 19 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++CC7A 22 1B C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++CC7D 22 1F C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CC80 22 21 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CC83 22 23 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  13++CC86 21 00 60         ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  14++CC89                  ;ld      hl,1
  15++CC89 22 15 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CC8C 22 1D C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CC8F 21 00 E0         ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  18++CC92 22 25 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  19++CC95 C9               ret
  20++CC96
  21++CC96              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  22++CC96              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  23++CC96              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  24++CC96
  25++CC96              LaunchedOrientation:
  26++CC96 CD 71 CC         call    InitialiseOrientation
  27++CC99                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  27++CC99 3A 22 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  27++CC9C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  27++CC9E 32 22 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  28++CCA1                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  28++CCA1 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  28++CCA4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  28++CCA6 32 24 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  29++CCA9                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  29++CCA9 3A 26 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  29++CCAC EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  29++CCAE 32 26 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  30++CCB1 C9               ret
  31++CCB2
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 552+ CCB2
 553+ CCB2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 554+ CCB2              OrientateVertex:
 555+ CCB2
 556+ CCB2              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 557+ CCB2              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 558+ CCB2              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 559+ CCB2              ;
 560+ CCB2
 561+ CCB2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 562+ CCB2              TransposeVertex:
 563+ CCB2              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 564+ CCB2              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 565+ CCB2              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 566+ CCB2              VectorToVertex:
 567+ CCB2              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 568+ CCB2              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 569+ CCB2              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 570+ CCB2
 571+ CCB2              Project:
 572+ CCB2 2A 0C C0     PROJ:                   ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; Project K+INWK(x,y)/z to K3,K4 for center to screen
 573+ CCB5 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl
 574+ CCB8 3A 0E C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 575+ CCBB CD D5 A7                             call    PLS6                            ; returns result in K (0 1) (unsigned) and K (3) = sign note to no longer does 2's C
 576+ CCBE D8                                   ret     c                               ; carry means don't print
 577+ CCBF 2A 2A 98                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 578+ CCC2                                      ; Now the question is as hl is the fractional part, should this be multiplied by 127 to get the actual range
 579+ CCC2 3E 80                                ld      a,ViewCenterX
 580+ CCC4 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 581+ CCC6 22 3D 98                             ld      (varK3),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 582+ CCC9 2A 0F C0     ProjectY:               ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 583+ CCCC 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl
 584+ CCCF 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 585+ CCD2 CD D5 A7                             call    PLS6
 586+ CCD5 D8                                   ret     c
 587+ CCD6 2A 2A 98                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 588+ CCD9 3E 40                                ld      a,ViewCenterY
 589+ CCDB ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 590+ CCDD 22 43 98                             ld      (varK4),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 591+ CCE0 C9                                   ret
 592+ CCE1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 593+ CCE1                                      include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm
   1++CCE1              ;
   2++CCE1              ; EraseOldLines:
   3++CCE1              ;	Loop from 0 to UbnKEdgeHeapCounter (note this should be 4 * actual nbr of lines)
   4++CCE1              ;		draw line (black) UBnkLinesArray[0,1]+Loop to [2,3]+loop
   5++CCE1              ;	 	loop + 4
   6++CCE1              ; Return
   7++CCE1
   8++CCE1              EraseOldLines:
   9++CCE1              EE51:										; if bit3 set draw lines in XX19 heap
  10++CCE1              	ReturnOnMemBitClear UBnKexplDsp,3       ; bit 3 denotes that there is nothing to erase as its already done
  10++CCE1 3A 35 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnKexplDsp)
  10++CCE4 CB 5F       >                        bit 	3,a
  10++CCE6 C8          >                        ret		z
  11++CCE7 CB DF        	set		3,a
  12++CCE9 32 35 C0     	ld		(UBnKexplDsp),a  				; else toggle bit3 to allow lines (set will do as its 0 by now)
  13++CCEC C3 D0 E8     	jp		clearLines						; LL115	clear LINEstr. Draw lines in XX19 heap.  - note its an & not direct
  14++CCEF              ; We use the ret from the clearLines so not needed here
  15++CCEF
# file closed: ././ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm
 594+ CCEF                                      include "./ModelRender/TrimToScreenGrad-LL118.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/TrimToScreenGrad-LL118.asm
   1++CCEF              ;TrimToScreenGrad:
   2++CCEF              ;LL118:										; Trim XX15,XX15+2 to screen grad=XX12+2 for CLIP
   3++CCEF              ;ret
   4++CCEF              ;TODO        ld      hl,(UBnKx1Lo)               ; XX15+0,1 \ x1 hi
   5++CCEF              ;TODO        bit     7,a
   6++CCEF              ;TODO        jr      nz,LL119		            ; x1 hi+ve skip down
   7++CCEF              ;TODO        ld      a,h
   8++CCEF              ;TODO        ld      (varS),a                    ; S	 \ else x1 hi -ve
   9++CCEF              ;TODO        call    XYeqyx1loSmulMdiv256                       ; LL120	 \ X1<0  their comment \ X.Y = x1_lo.S *  M/2566
  10++CCEF              ;TODO        ld      bc,(UbnKy1Lo)               ; step Y1 lo
  11++CCEF
  12++CCEF              ;18                      CLC
  13++CCEF              ;65 36                   ADC &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  14++CCEF              ;85 36                   STA &36			 \ XX15+2
  15++CCEF              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step Y1 hi
  16++CCEF              ;65 37                   ADC &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  17++CCEF              ;85 37                   STA &37			 \ XX15+3
  18++CCEF              ;A9 00                   LDA #0			 \ xleft min
  19++CCEF              ;85 34                   STA &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  20++CCEF              ;85 35                   STA &35		\ XX15+1 \ X1 = 0
  21++CCEF              ;AA                      TAX 			 \ Xreg = 0, will skip to Ytrim
  22++CCEF              ;	.LL119	\ x1 hi +ve from LL118
  23++CCEF              ;F0 19                   BEQ LL134		 \ if x1 hi = 0 skip to Ytrim
  24++CCEF              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S	 \ else x1 hi > 0
  25++CCEF              ;C6 83                   DEC &83		\ S	 \ x1 hi-1
  26++CCEF              ;20 19 50                JSR &5019	\ LL120  \ X1>255 their comment \ X.Y = x1lo.S *  M/256
  27++CCEF              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step Y1 lo
  28++CCEF              ;18                      CLC
  29++CCEF              ;65 36                   ADC &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  30++CCEF              ;85 36                   STA &36			 \ XX15+2
  31++CCEF              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step Y1 hi
  32++CCEF              ;65 37                   ADC &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  33++CCEF              ;85 37                   STA &37			 \ XX15+3
  34++CCEF              ;A2 FF                   LDX #&FF		 \ xright max
  35++CCEF              ;86 34                   STX &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  36++CCEF              ;E8                      INX 			 \ X = 0
  37++CCEF              ;86 35                   STX &35		\ XX15+1 \ X1 = 255
  38++CCEF              ;	.LL134	\ Ytrim
  39++CCEF              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ XX15+3 \ y1 hi
  40++CCEF              ;10 1A                   BPL LL135		 \ y1 hi +ve
  41++CCEF              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S	 \ else y1 hi -ve
  42++CCEF              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ XX15+2 \ y1 lo
  43++CCEF              ;85 82                   STA &82		\ R	 \ Y1<0 their comment
  44++CCEF              ;20 48 50                JSR &5048	\ LL123	 \ X.Y=R.S*256/M (M=grad.)   \where 256/M is gradient
  45++CCEF              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step X1 lo
  46++CCEF              ;18                      CLC
  47++CCEF              ;65 34                   ADC &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  48++CCEF              ;85 34                   STA &34			 \ XX15+0
  49++CCEF              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step X1 hi
  50++CCEF              ;65 35                   ADC &35		\ XX15+1 \ X1 hi
  51++CCEF              ;85 35                   STA &35			 \ XX15+1
  52++CCEF              ;A9 00                   LDA #0			 \ Y bottom min
  53++CCEF              ;85 36                   STA &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  54++CCEF              ;85 37                   STA &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 = 0
  55++CCEF              ;	.LL135	\ y1 hi +ve from LL134
  56++CCEF              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  57++CCEF              ;38                      SEC
  58++CCEF              ;E9 C0                   SBC #&C0		 \ #Y*2  screen y height
  59++CCEF              ;85 82                   STA &82		\ R	 \ Y1>191 their comment
  60++CCEF              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  61++CCEF              ;E9 00                   SBC #0			 \ any hi
  62++CCEF              ;85 83                   STA &83			 \ S
  63++CCEF              ;90 16                   BCC LL136		 \ failed, rts
  64++CCEF              ;	.LL139
  65++CCEF              ;20 48 50                JSR &5048	\ LL123	 \ X.Y=R.S*256/M (M=grad.)   \where 256/M is gradient
  66++CCEF              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step X1 lo
  67++CCEF              ;18                      CLC
  68++CCEF              ;65 34                   ADC &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  69++CCEF              ;85 34                   STA &34			 \ XX15+0
  70++CCEF              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step X1 hi
  71++CCEF              ;65 35                   ADC &35		\ XX15+1 \ X1 hi
  72++CCEF              ;85 35                   STA &35			 \ XX15+1
  73++CCEF              ;A9 BF                   LDA #&BF		 \ #Y*2-1 = y top max
  74++CCEF              ;85 36                   STA &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  75++CCEF              ;A9 00                   LDA #0			 \ Y1 hi = 0
  76++CCEF              ;85 37                   STA &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 = 191
  77++CCEF              ;	.LL136	\ rts
  78++CCEF              ;60                      RTS 		 	 \ -- trim for CLIP done
  79++CCEF              ;
  80++CCEF
