 758+ D304              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 759+ D304                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D304              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D304              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D304              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D304              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D304              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D304              ;;; R = T
   7++D304              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D304              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D304              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D304              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D304              ;;; R = T
  12++D304              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D304
  14++D304
  15++D304
  16++D304
  17++D304
  18++D304              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D304 ~            						mul
  20++D304 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D304              						ENDM
  22++D304              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D304 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D307                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D307 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D308 CA 25 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  25++D30B 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D30C 3A 83 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D30F 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D310                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D310 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D311 CA 25 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  29++D314 ED 30        		mul
  30++D316 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D317 3A 8A C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D31A 21 84 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D31D AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D31E E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D320 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D322 C3 29 D3             jp          dotmuly
  37++D325              dotxskipzero:
  38++D325 AF                   xor         a
  39++D326 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D327 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D329              dotmuly:
  42++D329              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D329 3A 8B C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D32C                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D32C A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D32D CA 4C D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  45++D330 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D331 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D334                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D334 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D335 CA 4C D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  48++D338 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D339 ED 30                mul
  50++D33B 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D33C DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D33E 3A 8C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D341 21 86 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D344 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D345 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D347 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D349 C3 50 D3             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D34C              dotyskipzero:
  59++D34C AF                   xor         a
  60++D34D 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D34E DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D350              dotaddxy:
  63++D350              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D350 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D352 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D353 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D355 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D356 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D358 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D359 CD 29 AE             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D35C 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D35D 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D360                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D360 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D361 CA 86 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  74++D364 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D365 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D368                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D368 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D369 CA 86 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  77++D36C 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D36D ED 30                mul
  79++D36F E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D370 3A 88 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D373 21 8E C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D376 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D377 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D379 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D37A E1                   pop         hl
  86++D37B 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D37C 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D37E CD 29 AE             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D381 32 18 98             ld          (varS),a
  90++D384 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D385 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D386              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D386 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D387 32 18 98             ld          (varS),a
  95++D38A 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D38B C9                   ret
  97++D38C              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D38C              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D38C              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D38C              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D38C              ;;;;		mul
 104++D38C              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D38C              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D38C              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D38C              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D38C              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D38C              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D38C              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D38C              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D38C              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D38C              ;;;;       mul
 117++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D38C              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D38C              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D38C              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D38C              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D38C              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D38C              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D38C              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D38C              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D38C              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D38C              ;;;;       mul
 132++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D38C              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D38C              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D38C              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D38C              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D38C              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D38C              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D38C              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D38C              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D38C
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 760+ D38C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 761+ D38C              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 762+ D38C                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D38C              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D38C              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D38C              ScaleNormal:
   4++D38C              LL93:
   5++D38C 3A 1D 98             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D38F DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D391 3A 87 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D394 DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D396 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D397              ScaleLoop:
  11++D397              LL933:
  12++D397 21 83 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D39A CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D39C 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D39D 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D39E CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D3A0 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D3A1 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D3A2 CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D3A4 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D3A5 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D3A7 F2 97 D3             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D3AA C9                   ret
  24++D3AB
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 763+ D3AB              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 764+ D3AB                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D3AB              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D3AB              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D3AB 3A 1E C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D3AE 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D3AF              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D3AF 3A 7E C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D3B2 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D3B3                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D3B3 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D3B4 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D3B5              LL90Loop:
  10++D3B5              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D3B5 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D3B6                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D3B6 2A 7A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D3B9 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D3BB CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D3BD 22 7A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D3C0                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D3C0 2A 77 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D3C3 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D3C5 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D3C7 22 77 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D3CA                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D3CA 2A 7D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D3CD CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D3CF CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D3D1 22 7D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D3D4 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D3D5                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D3D5 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  16++D3D7 C2 B5 D3    >                        jp	nz,LL90Loop
  17++D3DA C9                   ret
  18++D3DB
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 765+ D3DB              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 766+ D3DB
 767+ D3DB              ; Backface cull
 768+ D3DB              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 769+ D3DB              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 770+ D3DB              ;
 771+ D3DB
 772+ D3DB                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D3DB 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D3DC 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D3DD E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D3DF 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D3E2 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D3E3 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D3E5 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D3E6 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D3E8 32 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D3EB 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D3EC CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D3EE E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D3F0 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D3F3 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D3F4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D3F5 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D3F8 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D3F9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D3FA 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D3FD 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D3FE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D3FF 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D402 C9                                   ret
  24++D403
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 773+ D403                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D403 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D404 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D405 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D407 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D40A 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D40B CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D40D 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D40E E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D410 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D413 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D414 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D416 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D418 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D41B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D41C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D41D 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D420 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D421 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D422 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D425 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D426 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D427 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D42A C9                                   ret
  24++D42B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 774+ D42B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 775+ D42B              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 776+ D42B              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 777+ D42B              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 778+ D42B              ; return if no faces
 779+ D42B              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 780+ D42B              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 781+ D42B              ; While Z hi <> 0
 782+ D42B              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 783+ D42B              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 784+ D42B              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 785+ D42B              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 786+ D42B              ; Loop
 787+ D42B              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 788+ D42B              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 789+ D42B              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 790+ D42B              ; For each face
 791+ D42B              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 792+ D42B              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 793+ D42B              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 794+ D42B              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 795+ D42B              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 796+ D42B              ;        else
 797+ D42B              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 798+ D42B              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 799+ D42B              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 800+ D42B              ;           While X >= 0
 801+ D42B              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 802+ D42B              ;              if  x >= 0
 803+ D42B              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 804+ D42B              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 805+ D42B              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 806+ D42B              ;           loop
 807+ D42B              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 808+ D42B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 809+ D42B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 810+ D42B              ;               X = 1
 811+ D42B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 812+ D42B              ;           else
 813+ D42B              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 814+ D42B              ;           endif
 815+ D42B              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 816+ D42B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 817+ D42B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 818+ D42B              ;               X = 1
 819+ D42B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 820+ D42B              ;           else
 821+ D42B              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 822+ D42B              ;           endif
 823+ D42B              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 824+ D42B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 825+ D42B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 826+ D42B              ;               X = 1
 827+ D42B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 828+ D42B              ;           else
 829+ D42B              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 830+ D42B              ;           endif
 831+ D42B              ;        endif
 832+ D42B              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 833+ D42B              ;        if dot product < 0
 834+ D42B              ;           set face visible
 835+ D42B              ;        else
 836+ D42B              ;           set face invisible
 837+ D42B              ;        end if
 838+ D42B              ;     else
 839+ D42B              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 840+ D42B              ;     end if
 841+ D42B              ; Next Face
 842+ D42B
 843+ D42B DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 844+ D42D F8                                   ret     m
 845+ D42E 21 83 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 846+ D431 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 847+ D433 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 848+ D434 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 849+ D435 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 850+ D437 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 851+ D438 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 852+ D439 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 853+ D43B C3 2B D4                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
 854+ D43E C9                                   ret
 855+ D43F
 856+ D43F 21 77 C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
 857+ D442 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 858+ D444 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 859+ D445 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 860+ D446 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 861+ D448 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
 862+ D449 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 863+ D44A CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 864+ D44C C9                                   ret
 865+ D44D
 866+ D44D              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 867+ D44D
 868+ D44D              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 869+ D44D              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 870+ D44D              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 871+ D44D              ;
 872+ D44D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 873+ D44D              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 874+ D44D              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 875+ D44D              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 876+ D44D              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 877+ D44D
 878+ D44D              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
 879+ D44D 21 3E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 880+ D450 CD 0D 8F                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 881+ D453 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 882+ D454 7D                                   ld      a,l
 883+ D455 B0                                   or      b
 884+ D456 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 885+ D459 7D                                   ld      a,l
 886+ D45A 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 887+ D45D
 888+ D45D 21 44 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 889+ D460 CD 0D 8F                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 890+ D463 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 891+ D464 7D                                   ld      a,l
 892+ D465 B0                                   or      b
 893+ D466 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 894+ D469 7D                                   ld      a,l
 895+ D46A 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 896+ D46D
 897+ D46D 21 4A C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 898+ D470 CD 0D 8F                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 899+ D473 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 900+ D474 7D                                   ld      a,l
 901+ D475 B0                                   or      b
 902+ D476 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 903+ D479 7D                                   ld      a,l
 904+ D47A 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 905+ D47D C9                                   ret
 906+ D47E
 907+ D47E                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D47E 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D47F              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D47F              ; EE29:
   4++D47F
   5++D47F              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D47F              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D47F              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D47F              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D47F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D47F              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D47F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D47F              ;
  13++D47F              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D47F              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D47F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D47F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D47F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D47F              ;
  19++D47F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D47F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D47F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D47F              ;
  23++D47F              ; so
  24++D47F              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D47F              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D47F              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D47F              ;
  28++D47F              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D47F              ;
  30++D47F              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D47F              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D47F              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D47F              ;
  34++D47F
  35++D47F
  36++D47F
  37++D47F 3A 7E C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D482                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D482 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D483 CA B0 D4    >                        jp	z, .ScaleDone
  39++D486 2A 77 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D489 ED 5B 7A C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D48D ED 4B 7D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D491 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D493                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D493 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D495 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D497                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D497 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D499 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D49B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D49B CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D49D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D49F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D4A0                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D4A0 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  47++D4A2 C2 91 D4    >                        jp	nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D4A5 22 77 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D4A8 ED 53 7A C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D4AC ED 43 7D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D4B0 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D4B2 32 1D 98                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D4B5 C9                                   ret
  54++D4B6
  55++D4B6              ;;--BackFaceCull:
  56++D4B6              ;;--;debug:jp debug
  57++D4B6              ;;--; DEBUG  force for now
  58++D4B6              ;;--;                        ld     a,MaxVisibility                 ; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  59++D4B6              ;;--;                        ld     (LastNormalVisible),a           ; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  60++D4B6              ;;--;

  63++D4B6              ;;--                       ; break
  64++D4B6              ;;--                        call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
  65++D4B6              ;;--                        call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
  66++D4B6              ;;--                        call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  67++D4B6              ;;--                        call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
  68++D4B6              ;;--
  69++D4B6              ;;--.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
  70++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
  71++D4B6              ;;--; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
  72++D4B6              ;;--                        call    ScaleDrawcam
  73++D4B6              ;;--                        call    CopyDrawCamToScaled

  75++D4B6              ;;--                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = xx15.xx16
  76++D4B6              ;;--.PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
  77++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl
  78++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
  79++D4B6              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  80++D4B6              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  81++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D4B6              ;;--                        xor     a
  83++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
  84++D4B6              ;;--ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
  85++D4B6              ;;--                        push    bc
  86++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
  87++D4B6              ;;--                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
  88++D4B6              ;;--                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
  89++D4B6              ;;--.LL86:                  jp  .LL87 ; force testing of normals
  90++D4B6              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible
  91++D4B6              ;;--; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
  92++D4B6              ;;--.LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12
  93++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX17)
  94++D4B6              ;;--                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
  95++D4B6              ;;--.LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15
  96++D4B6              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D4B6              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D4B6              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a
 100++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 101++D4B6              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 103++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 104++D4B6              ;;--                        srl     a
 105++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 107++D4B6              ;;--.LL92:                   ld      b,a
 108++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 109++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 110++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled

 112++D4B6              ;;--                        jp      m, .LL94
 113++D4B6              ;;--.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled

 115++D4B6              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled

 124++D4B6              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw

 127++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 128++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 129++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 130++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)

 143++D4B6              ;;--.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 144++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)

 146++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 147++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 148++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 149++D4B6              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 150++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (varS),a
 151++D4B6              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 152++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 153++D4B6              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 154++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a

 156++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)

 158++D4B6              ;;--                        xor     (hl)

 164++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a

 166++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 167++D4B6              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 168++D4B6              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 169++D4B6              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product

 171++D4B6              ;;--                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 172++D4B6              ;;--.FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)

 174++D4B6              ;;--                        jp          ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if

 177++D4B6              ;;--ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx

 179++D4B6              ;;--                        pop         bc
 180++D4B6              ;;--                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back

 182++D4B6              ;;--                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry

 184++D4B6              ;;--                        dec         b
 185++D4B6              ;;--                        jp          nz,ProcessNormalsLoop
 186++D4B6              ;;--                        ret
