 312++D4B6              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D4B6              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D4B6              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D4B6              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D4B6              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D4B6              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D4B6              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D4B6              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D4B6              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D4B6              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D4B6              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D4B6              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D4B6              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D4B6              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D4B6              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D4B6              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D4B6              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D4B6              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D4B6              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D4B6              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D4B6              ;;;;;
 333++D4B6
 334++D4B6
 335++D4B6
 336++D4B6 3A 14 C0     CheckDistance:          ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 337++D4B9 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 338++D4BB 20 3E                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 339++D4BD 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 340++D4C0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 341++D4C1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 341++D4C1 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 341++D4C3 D2 FB D4    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 342++D4C6 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 343++D4CA CD E0 AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 344++D4CD 38 2C                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 345++D4CF ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 346++D4D3 CD E0 AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 347++D4D6 38 23                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 348++D4D8              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 348++D4D8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348++D4DA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349++D4DC                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 349++D4DC CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D4DE CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D4E0                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D4E0 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D4E2 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D4E4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 352++D4E5 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 353++D4E7              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 353++D4E7 C2 FD D4    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 354++D4EA                                      ; Check visbility distance
 355++D4EA              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 356++D4EA 7D                                   ld      a,l
 357++D4EB 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 358++D4EC CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 359++D4EE CB 3F                                srl     a
 360++D4F0 CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D4F2 32 36 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 362++D4F5                                      SetATrue
 362++D4F5 AF          >                        xor     a
 363++D4F6 32 9C C0                             ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a           ; set draw as dot to 0, i.e. false
 364++D4F9                                      ClearCarryFlag
 364++D4F9 B7          >                        or a
 365++D4FA C9                                   ret
 366++D4FB              .ShipNoDraw:            SetCarryFlag                        ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 366++D4FB 37          >                        scf
 367++D4FC C9                                   ret
 368++D4FD              .ShipIsADot:            SetMemFalse UBnKDrawAsDot           ; use the same logic as process nodes to do 1 point
 368++D4FD 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 368++D4FF 32 9C C0    >                        ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a
 369++D502                                      ClearCarryFlag
 369++D502 B7          >                        or a
 370++D503 C9                                   ret
 371++D504
 372++D504
 373++D504              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 374++D504              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 374++D504 3A 18 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 374++D507 A7          >                        and a
 374++D508 C8          >                        ret    z
 375++D509                                     ; break
 376++D509 CD 52 CF                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 377++D50C CD A1 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 378++D50F CD 08 D2                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 379++D512                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 380++D512 3A 1E C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 381++D515 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 382++D517              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 383++D517 CD 7F D4                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 384++D51A CD 21 D2                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 385++D51D CD F8 8F     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 386++D520 CD 99 D1                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 387++D523 21 01 C9     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 388++D526 22 14 97                             ld      (varV),hl
 389++D529 3A 18 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 390++D52C CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 391++D52E CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 392++D530 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 393++D531 AF                                   xor     a
 394++D532 32 7E D4                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 395++D535 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 396++D536 C5                                   push    bc
 397++D537 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 398++D538 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 399++D53A E5                                   push    hl
 400++D53B 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 401++D53E BE                                   cp      (hl)
 402++D53F E1                                   pop     hl
 403++D540 DA 85 D6                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 404++D543              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 405++D543 CD 03 D4     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 406++D546 3A 1D 98                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 407++D549 47                                   ld      b,a
 408++D54A                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 408++D54A FE 04       >                        cp      4
 408++D54C DA 87 D5    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 409++D54F CD E3 D1     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 410++D552 C3 16 D6                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 411++D555 3A 77 C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 412++D558 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 413++D55A 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 414++D55D 3A 7D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 415++D560 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 416++D562 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 417++D565 3A 7A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 418++D568 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 419++D56A 32 7A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 420++D56D 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 421++D56F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 421++D56F 3A 83 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 421++D572 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 421++D574 32 83 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 422++D577                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 422++D577 3A 85 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 422++D57A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 422++D57C 32 85 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 423++D57F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 423++D57F 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 423++D582 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 423++D584 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 424++D587              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 425++D587              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 426++D587 CD BE D1                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 427++D58A 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 428++D58B FA AA D5                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 429++D58E              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 429++D58E 3A 83 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 429++D591 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 429++D593 32 83 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 430++D596                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 430++D596 3A 85 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 430++D599 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 430++D59B 32 85 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 431++D59E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 431++D59E 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 431++D5A1 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 431++D5A3 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 432++D5A6 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 433++D5A7 F2 8E D5                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 434++D5AA              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 435++D5AA              ; Add normal to XX15
 436++D5AA              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 437++D5AA              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 438++D5AA              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 439++D5AA              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 440++D5AA              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 440++D5AA 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 440++D5AD 32 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),a
 441++D5B0                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 441++D5B0 3A 8E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 441++D5B3 32 18 98    >                        ld       (varS),a
 442++D5B6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 442++D5B6 3A 7D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 442++D5B9 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 443++D5BC 3A 7F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 444++D5BF CD 47 AF                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 445++D5C2 DA 55 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 446++D5C5 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 447++D5C8                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 447++D5C8 3A 18 98    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 447++D5CB 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 448++D5CE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 448++D5CE 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 448++D5D1 32 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),a
 449++D5D4                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 449++D5D4 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 449++D5D7 32 18 98    >                        ld       (varS),a
 450++D5DA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 450++D5DA 3A 77 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 450++D5DD 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 451++D5E0 3A 79 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 452++D5E3 CD 47 AF                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 453++D5E6 DA 55 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 454++D5E9 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 455++D5EC                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 455++D5EC 3A 18 98    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 455++D5EF 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 456++D5F2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 456++D5F2 3A 85 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 456++D5F5 32 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),a
 457++D5F8                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 457++D5F8 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 457++D5FB 32 18 98    >                        ld       (varS),a
 458++D5FE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 458++D5FE 3A 7A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 458++D601 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 459++D604 3A 7C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 460++D607 CD 47 AF                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 461++D60A DA 55 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 462++D60D 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 463++D610                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 463++D610 3A 18 98    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 463++D613 32 86 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 464++D616              ; calculate dot product LL89
 465++D616              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 465++D616 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 465++D619 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 466++D61C 3A 83 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 467++D61F CD B3 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 468++D622 32 33 98                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 469++D625 3A 8A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 470++D628 21 84 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 471++D62B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 472++D62C 32 18 98                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 473++D62F                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 473++D62F 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 473++D632 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 474++D635 3A 85 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 475++D638 CD B3 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 476++D63B 32 16 98                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 477++D63E                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 477++D63E 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 477++D641 32 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),a
 478++D644 3A 8C C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 479++D647 21 86 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 480++D64A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 481++D64B CD 47 AF                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 482++D64E 32 33 98                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 483++D651                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 483++D651 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 483++D654 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 484++D657 3A 87 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 485++D65A CD B3 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 486++D65D 32 16 98                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 487++D660                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 487++D660 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 487++D663 32 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),a
 488++D666 3A 88 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 489++D669 21 8E C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 490++D66C AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 491++D66D CD 47 AF                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 492++D670 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 493++D672 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 494++D674 3A 18 98                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 495++D677 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 496++D67A 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 497++D67C 3A 7E D4     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 498++D67F CD 66 D0                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 499++D682 C3 8B D6                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 500++D685 3A 7E D4     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 501++D688 CD 5D D0                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 502++D68B 21 7E D4     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 503++D68E 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 504++D68F C1                                   pop         bc
 505++D690 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 506++D691 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 507++D693 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 508++D695 22 14 97                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 509++D698 05                                   dec         b
 510++D699 C2 35 D5                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 511++D69C C9                                   ret
 512++D69D
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 908+ D69D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 909+ D69D              ; Process edges
 910+ D69D              ; .....................................................
 911+ D69D              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
 912+ D69D ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 913+ D69D ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 914+ D69D ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 915+ D69D ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 916+ D69D ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 917+ D69D ~            NodeXPositive\1
 917+ D69D ~
 918+ D69D ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 919+ D69D ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 920+ D69D ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 921+ D69D ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 922+ D69D ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 923+ D69D ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 924+ D69D ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 925+ D69D ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 926+ D69D ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
 927+ D69D ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 928+ D69D ~            NodeNegative\1
 928+ D69D ~
 929+ D69D ~            LL52\1
 929+ D69D ~                                                              ;
 930+ D69D ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
 931+ D69D ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
 932+ D69D ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 933+ D69D ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 934+ D69D ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 935+ D69D ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
 935+ D69D ~
 936+ D69D ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 937+ D69D ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 938+ D69D ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 939+ D69D ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 940+ D69D ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 941+ D69D ~            SetAndMop\1
 941+ D69D ~
 942+ D69D ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 943+ D69D ~            FinishedThisNode\1
 944+ D69D                                  ENDM
 945+ D69D
 946+ D69D              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 947+ D69D
 948+ D69D              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 949+ D69D                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 949+ D69D 3A 0E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
 949+ D6A0 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
 950+ D6A3 ED 4B 89 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 951+ D6A7 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 952+ D6A8 FA BE D6             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 953+ D6AB              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 954+ D6AB              NodeXPositiveX:
 955+ D6AB 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 956+ D6AC 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 957+ D6AE 2A 0C C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 958+ D6B1 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 959+ D6B3 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 960+ D6B4 22 83 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 961+ D6B7 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 962+ D6B8 32 85 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 963+ D6BB C3 DA D6             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 964+ D6BE              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 965+ D6BE              NodeNegativeX:
 966+ D6BE              LL52X:                                                 ;
 967+ D6BE 2A 0C C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
 968+ D6C1 ED 4B 89 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
 969+ D6C5 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 970+ D6C7 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 971+ D6C9 F2 D7 D6             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 972+ D6CC              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 973+ D6CC              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 974+ D6CC CD F6 AB             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 975+ D6CF 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 976+ D6D2 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 977+ D6D4 32 85 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 978+ D6D7              SetAndMopX:
 979+ D6D7 22 0C C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 980+ D6DA              FinishedThisNodeX:
 981+ D6DA
 982+ D6DA              LL53:
 983+ D6DA
 984+ D6DA                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 984+ D6DA 3A 11 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKysgn)
 984+ D6DD 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkYPointSign),a
 985+ D6E0 ED 4B 8B C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 986+ D6E4 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 987+ D6E5 FA FB D6             jp          m,NodeNegativeY                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 988+ D6E8              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 989+ D6E8              NodeXPositiveY:
 990+ D6E8 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 991+ D6E9 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 992+ D6EB 2A 0F C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 993+ D6EE 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 994+ D6F0 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 995+ D6F1 22 86 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 996+ D6F4 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 997+ D6F5 32 85 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 998+ D6F8 C3 17 D7             jp          FinishedThisNodeY
 999+ D6FB              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1000+ D6FB              NodeNegativeY:
1001+ D6FB              LL52Y:                                                 ;
1002+ D6FB 2A 0F C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
1003+ D6FE ED 4B 8B C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
1004+ D702 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1005+ D704 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1006+ D706 F2 14 D7             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1007+ D709              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
1008+ D709              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1009+ D709 CD F6 AB             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1010+ D70C 3A 88 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1011+ D70F EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1012+ D711 32 88 C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1013+ D714              SetAndMopY:
1014+ D714 22 0F C0             ld          (UBnKylo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1015+ D717              FinishedThisNodeY:
1016+ D717
1017+ D717
1018+ D717              TransposeZ:
1019+ D717              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
1020+ D717 3A 8E C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
1021+ D71A                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
1021+ D71A CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1021+ D71C C2 30 D7    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
1022+ D71F 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
1023+ D722 2A 12 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
1024+ D725 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
1025+ D727 7D                   ld          a,l
1026+ D728 32 33 98             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
1027+ D72B 7C                   ld          a,h
1028+ D72C 32 15 98             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
1029+ D72F C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
1030+ D730              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1031+ D730              NegativeNodeZ:
1032+ D730              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1033+ D730 2A 12 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1034+ D733 ED 4B 8D C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
1035+ D737 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
1036+ D739                      ClearCarryFlag
1036+ D739 B7          >                        or a
1037+ D73A ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1038+ D73C 7D                   ld          a,l
1039+ D73D 32 33 98             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1040+ D740 7C                   ld          a,h
1041+ D741 32 15 98             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1042+ D744 E2 51 D7             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1043+ D747              LL56Overflow:
1044+ D747 FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1045+ D749 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1046+ D74B 3A 33 98             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1047+ D74E                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1047+ D74E FE 04       >                        cp    4
1047+ D750 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1048+ D751              MakeNodeClose:
1049+ D751              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1050+ D751 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1051+ D752 32 15 98             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1052+ D755 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1053+ D757 32 33 98             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1054+ D75A C9                   ret
1055+ D75B              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1056+ D75B              ProcessVisibleNode:
1057+ D75B              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1058+ D75B CD 68 D1             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1059+ D75E              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1060+ D75E              TransposeNode:
1061+ D75E CD 9D D6             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1062+ D761
1063+ D761              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1064+ D761              NodeAdditionsDone:
1065+ D761              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1066+ D761              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1067+ D761 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1068+ D764 21 84 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1069+ D767 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1070+ D768 21 87 C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1071+ D76B B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1072+ D76C              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1073+ D76C 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1074+ D76E              DivideXYZBy2:
1075+ D76E                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1075+ D76E 2A 83 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1075+ D771 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1075+ D773 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1075+ D775 22 83 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1076+ D778                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1076+ D778 2A 86 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1076+ D77B CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1076+ D77D CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1076+ D77F 22 86 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1077+ D782 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1078+ D785 67                   ld          h,a
1079+ D786 3A 33 98             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1080+ D789 6F                   ld          l,a
1081+ D78A                      ShiftHLRight1
1081+ D78A CB 3C       >			   srl h
1081+ D78C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1082+ D78E 7C                   ld          a,h
1083+ D78F 32 15 98             ld          (varU),a
1084+ D792 7D                   ld          a,l
1085+ D793 32 33 98             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1086+ D796 C3 61 D7             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1087+ D799              NodeScalingDone:
1088+ D799              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1089+ D799              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1090+ D799                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1090+ D799 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1090+ D79C 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1091+ D79F 3A 83 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1092+ D7A2 21 16 98             ld          hl,varQ
1093+ D7A5 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1094+ D7A6                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1094+ D7A6 DA AF D7    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1095+ D7A9 CD 4E B0             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1096+ D7AC C3 B7 D7             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1097+ D7AF              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1098+ D7AF              LL69:
1099+ D7AF              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1100+ D7AF              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1101+ D7AF              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1102+ D7AF 47                   ld      b,a
1103+ D7B0 CD 3F AA             call    DIV16UNDOC
1104+ D7B3 79                   ld      a,c
1105+ D7B4 32 17 98             ld      (varR),a
1106+ D7B7               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1107+ D7B7              SkipSmallAngle:
1108+ D7B7              ScaleX:
1109+ D7B7              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1110+ D7B7 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1111+ D7BA                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1111+ D7BA CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1111+ D7BC C2 CF D7    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1112+ D7BF              ; ......................................................
1113+ D7BF              PositiveXPoint:
1114+ D7BF 3A 17 98             ld          a,(varR)
1115+ D7C2 6F                   ld          l,a
1116+ D7C3 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)
1117+ D7C6 67                   ld          h,a
1118+ D7C7 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1119+ D7C9 ED 31                add         hl,a
1120+ D7CB EB                   ex          de,hl
1121+ D7CC C3 DF D7             jp          StoreXPoint
1122+ D7CF              NegativeXPoint:
1123+ D7CF              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1124+ D7CF 3A 17 98             ld          a,(varR)
1125+ D7D2 6F                   ld          l,a
1126+ D7D3 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)
1127+ D7D6 67                   ld          h,a
1128+ D7D7 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1129+ D7D9 06 00                ld          b,0
1130+ D7DB                      ClearCarryFlag
1130+ D7DB B7          >                        or a
1131+ D7DC ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1132+ D7DE EB                   ex          de,hl
1133+ D7DF              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1134+ D7DF FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1135+ D7E2 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1136+ D7E5 FD 23                inc         iy
1137+ D7E7 FD 23                inc         iy
1138+ D7E9              ; ......................................................
1139+ D7E9              LL66:
1140+ D7E9              ProcessYPoint:
1141+ D7E9 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1142+ D7EA 32 15 98             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1143+ D7ED                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1143+ D7ED 3A 33 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1143+ D7F0 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1144+ D7F3 3A 86 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1145+ D7F6 21 16 98             ld          hl,varQ
1146+ D7F9 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1147+ D7FA                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1147+ D7FA DA 03 D8    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1148+ D7FD              SmallYPoint:
1149+ D7FD CD 4E B0             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1150+ D800 C3 06 D8             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1151+ D803              SmallYHop:
1152+ D803              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1153+ D803 CD 2B B0             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1154+ D806              SkipYScale:
1155+ D806              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1156+ D806 3A 88 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1157+ D809 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1158+ D80B C2 1E D8             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1159+ D80E              PositiveYPoint:
1160+ D80E 3A 17 98             ld          a,(varR)
1161+ D811 6F                   ld          l,a
1162+ D812 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)
1163+ D815 67                   ld          h,a
1164+ D816 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1165+ D818 ED 31                add         hl,a
1166+ D81A EB                   ex          de,hl
1167+ D81B C3 2E D8             jp          LL50
1168+ D81E              NegativeYPoint:
1169+ D81E              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1170+ D81E 3A 17 98             ld          a,(varR)
1171+ D821 6F                   ld          l,a
1172+ D822 3A 15 98             ld          a,(varU)
1173+ D825 67                   ld          h,a
1174+ D826 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1175+ D828 06 00                ld          b,0
1176+ D82A                      ClearCarryFlag
1176+ D82A B7          >                        or a
1177+ D82B ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1178+ D82D EB                   ex          de,hl
1179+ D82E              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1180+ D82E FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1181+ D831 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1182+ D834 FD 23                inc         iy
1183+ D836 FD 23                inc         iy
1184+ D838 C9                   ret
1185+ D839              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1186+ D839              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1187+ D839              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1188+ D839              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1189+ D839              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1190+ D839              CopyNodeToXX15:
1191+ D839                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1191+ D839 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1191+ D83A 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1192+ D83D 23                   inc         hl
1193+ D83E                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1193+ D83E 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1193+ D83F 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1194+ D842 23                   inc         hl
1195+ D843                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1195+ D843 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1195+ D844 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1196+ D847 23                   inc         hl
1197+ D848              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1198+ D848              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1199+ D848 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1200+ D849 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1201+ D84A 47                   ld          b,a
1202+ D84B E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1203+ D84D 32 84 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1204+ D850 78                   ld          a,b
1205+ D851 E6 40                and         $40
1206+ D853 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1207+ D855 32 86 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1208+ D858 78                   ld          a,b
1209+ D859 E6 20                and         $20
1210+ D85B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1211+ D85D CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1212+ D85F 32 88 C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1213+ D862 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1214+ D863 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1215+ D865 32 33 98             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1216+ D868 C9                   ret
1217+ D869
1218+ D869              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1219+ D869              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1220+ D869              ;..............................................................................................................................
1221+ D869              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1222+ D869              LL48GetScale:
1223+ D869 3A 04 97             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1224+ D86C 5F                   ld          e,a
1225+ D86D CD 39 D8             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1226+ D870              LL48GetVertices:
1227+ D870              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1228+ D870                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1228+ D870 BB          >                        cp      e
1228+ D871 DA B2 D8    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1229+ D874              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1230+ D874                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1230+ D874 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1230+ D875 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1230+ D876 32 0F 97    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1231+ D879 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1232+ D87A E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1233+ D87C E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1234+ D87D                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1234+ D87D 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1234+ D880 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1234+ D882 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1235+ D883 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1236+ D884                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1236+ D884 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1236+ D886 C2 B8 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1237+ D889              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1238+ D889 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1239+ D88A ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1240+ D88C E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1241+ D88E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1241+ D88E FE 00       >                        cp	0
1241+ D890 C2 B8 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1242+ D893              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1243+ D893                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1243+ D893 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1243+ D894 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1243+ D895 32 0F 97    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1244+ D898 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1245+ D899 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1246+ D89B E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1247+ D89C                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1247+ D89C 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1247+ D89F ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1247+ D8A1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1248+ D8A2 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1249+ D8A3                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1249+ D8A3 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1249+ D8A5 C2 B8 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1250+ D8A8              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1251+ D8A8 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1252+ D8A9 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1253+ D8AB E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1254+ D8AD                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1254+ D8AD FE 00       >                        cp	0
1254+ D8AF C2 B8 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1255+ D8B2              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1256+ D8B2 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1257+ D8B5 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1258+ D8B7                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1259+ D8B7 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1260+ D8B8              NodeIsVisible:
1261+ D8B8              LL49:
1262+ D8B8 CD 5B D7             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1263+ D8BB C9                   ret
1264+ D8BC
1265+ D8BC
1266+ D8BC              ProjectNodeToEye:
1267+ D8BC ED 4B 87 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1268+ D8C0 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1269+ D8C1 32 16 98     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1270+ D8C4 3A 83 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1271+ D8C7 CD 28 AA     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1272+ D8CA 3A 84 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1273+ D8CD                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1273+ D8CD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1273+ D8CF C2 DA D8    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1274+ D8D2              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1275+ D8D2 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1276+ D8D4 26 00            ld          h,0
1277+ D8D6 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1278+ D8D7 C3 E1 D8         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1279+ D8DA              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1280+ D8DA 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1281+ D8DC 26 00            ld          h,0
1282+ D8DE                  ClearCarryFlag
1282+ D8DE B7          >                        or a
1283+ D8DF ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1284+ D8E1              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1285+ D8E1 EB               ex          de,hl
1286+ D8E2 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1287+ D8E5 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1288+ D8E8              EyeProcessYPoint:
1289+ D8E8 ED 4B 87 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1290+ D8EC 79           	ld			a,c
1291+ D8ED 32 16 98     	ld			(varQ),a
1292+ D8F0 3A 85 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1293+ D8F3 CD 28 AA     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1294+ D8F6 3A 86 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1295+ D8F9                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1295+ D8F9 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1295+ D8FB C2 06 D9    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1296+ D8FE              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1297+ D8FE 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1298+ D900                  ClearCarryFlag
1298+ D900 B7          >                        or a
1299+ D901 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1300+ D903 C3 0B D9         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1301+ D906              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1302+ D906 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1303+ D908 26 00            ld          h,0
1304+ D90A 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1305+ D90B              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1306+ D90B EB               ex          de,hl
1307+ D90C FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1308+ D90F FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1309+ D912 C9               ret
1310+ D913
1311+ D913
1312+ D913
1313+ D913              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1314+ D913              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1315+ D913              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1316+ D913              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1317+ D913              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1318+ D913              ; which can be simplified as:
1319+ D913              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1320+ D913              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1321+ D913              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1322+ D913              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1323+ D913              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1324+ D913              ;      Roll calculations:
1325+ D913              ;
1326+ D913              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1327+ D913              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1328+ D913              ;      Pitch calculations:
1329+ D913              ;
1330+ D913              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1331+ D913              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1332+ D913
1333+ D913
1334+ D913              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1335+ D913                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D913
   2++D913              ; Full version
   3++D913              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D913              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D913              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D913              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D913
   8++D913
   9++D913              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D913             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D913 3A 2C 97    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D916 32 16 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D919             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D919 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D91C 22 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D91F             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D91F 3A 21 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D922 32 0F 97    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D925 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D928 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D92A CD 1D A8    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D92D ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D931             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D931 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D934 22 17 98    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D937 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D93A CD 1D A8    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D93D ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D941 C9                                   ret
  11++D942              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY

  11++D942 3A 2C 97    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)

  20++DA18 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
