  21++DA2C C9                                   ret
  22++DA2D
  23++DA2D
  24++DA2D              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++DA2D ~                                    push    bc
  26++DA2D ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++DA2D ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++DA2D ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++DA2D ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++DA2D ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++DA2D ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++DA2D ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++DA2D ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++DA2D ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++DA2D ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++DA2D ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++DA2D ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++DA2D ~                                    pop     bc
  39++DA2D ~                                    ret
  40++DA2D ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++DA2D ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++DA2D ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++DA2D ~                                    or      a
  44++DA2D ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++DA2D ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++DA2D ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++DA2D ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++DA2D ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++DA2D ~                                    pop     bc
  50++DA2D ~                                    ret
  51++DA2D ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++DA2D ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++DA2D ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++DA2D ~                                    pop     bc
  55++DA2D ~                                    ret
  56++DA2D                                      ENDM
  57++DA2D
  58++DA2D
  59++DA2D              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++DA2D C5          >                        push    bc
  59++DA2E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++DA2F 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++DA32 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++DA33 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++DA34 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++DA35 FA 46 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++DA38             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++DA38 ED 5B 10 97 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++DA3C 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA3F 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++DA40 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++DA43 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++DA44 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA45 C9          >                        ret
  59++DA46             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++DA46 ED 5B 10 97 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++DA4A 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA4D B7          >                        or      a
  59++DA4E ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++DA50 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++DA52 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++DA53 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++DA56 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++DA58 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA59 C9          >                        ret
  59++DA5A             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++DA5A AF          >                    xor a
  59++DA5B 95          >                    sub l
  59++DA5C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++DA5D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++DA5E 94          >                    sub h
  59++DA5F 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++DA60 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++DA63 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++DA64 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA65 C9          >                        ret
  60++DA66
  61++DA66              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++DA66 C5          >                        push    bc
  61++DA67 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++DA68 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++DA6B 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++DA6C 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++DA6D A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++DA6E FA 7F DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++DA71             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++DA71 ED 5B 10 97 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++DA75 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DA78 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++DA79 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++DA7C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++DA7D C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA7E C9          >                        ret
  61++DA7F             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++DA7F ED 5B 10 97 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++DA83 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DA86 B7          >                        or      a
  61++DA87 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++DA89 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++DA8B 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++DA8C 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++DA8F EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++DA91 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA92 C9          >                        ret
  61++DA93             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++DA93 AF          >                    xor a
  61++DA94 95          >                    sub l
  61++DA95 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++DA96 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++DA97 94          >                    sub h
  61++DA98 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++DA99 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++DA9C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++DA9D C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA9E C9          >                        ret
  62++DA9F
  63++DA9F              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++DA9F C5          >                        push    bc
  63++DAA0 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++DAA1 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++DAA4 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++DAA5 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++DAA6 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++DAA7 FA B8 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++DAAA             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++DAAA ED 5B 10 97 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++DAAE 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DAB1 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++DAB2 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++DAB5 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++DAB6 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DAB7 C9          >                        ret
  63++DAB8             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++DAB8 ED 5B 10 97 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++DABC 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DABF B7          >                        or      a
  63++DAC0 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++DAC2 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++DAC4 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++DAC5 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++DAC8 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++DACA C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DACB C9          >                        ret
  63++DACC             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++DACC AF          >                    xor a
  63++DACD 95          >                    sub l
  63++DACE 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++DACF 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++DAD0 94          >                    sub h
  63++DAD1 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++DAD2 22 10 97    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++DAD5 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++DAD6 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DAD7 C9          >                        ret
  64++DAD8
  65++DAD8              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++DAD8 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++DADB              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++DADB              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++DADB              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++DADB
  71++DADB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++DADB              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++DADB 3A 2D 97     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++DADE 21 1D 97                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++DAE1 B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++DAE2 CA 9C DB                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++DAE5                                      ;break
  78++DAE5              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++DAE5 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++DAE6 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++DAE9 CD 79 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++DAEC 32 11 97                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++DAEF 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++DAF2              ; A = Flip sign
  85++DAF2 3A 2F 97                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++DAF5 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++DAF8 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++DAF9              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++DAF9 CD 66 DA                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++DAFC              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++DAFC 32 DA DA                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++DAFF 22 D8 DA                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++DB02              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++DB02 3A 1D 97                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++DB05 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++DB06 CD 79 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++DB09 32 11 97                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++DB0C 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++DB0F              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++DB0F 3A DA DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++DB12 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++DB13 3A 1E 97                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++DB16 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++DB17              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++DB17 CD 9F DA                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++DB1A 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++DB1D 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++DB20              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++DB20 3A 1D 97                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++DB23 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++DB24 CD 79 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++DB27 32 11 97                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++DB2A 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++DB2D              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++DB2D 3A DA DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++DB30 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++DB33 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++DB34 3A 1E 97                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++DB37 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++DB38 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++DB39 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++DB3C AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++DB3D F2 4C DB                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++DB40 2A 10 97                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++DB43 ED 5B D8 DA                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++DB47 B7                                   or      a
 127++DB48 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++DB49 C3 66 DB                             jp      .MV44
 129++DB4C 2A D8 DA     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++DB4F ED 5B 10 97                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++DB53 B7                                   or      a
 132++DB54 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++DB56 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++DB58                                      NegHL
 134++DB58 AF          >                    xor a
 134++DB59 95          >                    sub l
 134++DB5A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++DB5B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++DB5C 94          >                    sub h
 134++DB5D 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++DB5E 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++DB61 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++DB63 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++DB66              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++DB66 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++DB69 3A 2D 97                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++DB6C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++DB6D 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++DB70 CD 79 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++DB73 32 11 97                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++DB76 22 0F 97                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++DB79 3A 2E 97                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++DB7C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++DB7D 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++DB80 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++DB81 CD 2D DA                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++DB84 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++DB87 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++DB8A                                      ;break
 154++DB8A                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++DB8A
 156++DB8A CD 13 D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++DB8D CD 42 D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++DB90 CD 71 D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++DB93 CD A0 D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++DB96 CD CF D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++DB99 CD FE D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++DB9C 3A 12 98     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++DB9F 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++DBA1 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++DBA2 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++DBA5 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++DBA8 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++DBA9 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++DBAB CD 29 AE                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++DBAE 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++DBB1 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++DBB4 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1336+ DBB5                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++DBB5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DBB5              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++DBB5 3A 34 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++DBB8 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++DBB9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++DBBB 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++DBBC 32 3C C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++DBBF 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++DBC0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++DBC2 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++DBC4 FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++DBC6 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++DBC8 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++DBC9 32 3D C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++DBCC 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++DBCD B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++DBCE 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++DBD1 21 1B C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++DBD4 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++DBD7 21 21 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++DBDA 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++DBDD CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++DBE0 21 1D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++DBE3 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++DBE6 21 23 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++DBE9 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++DBEC CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++DBEF 21 1F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++DBF2 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++DBF5 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++DBF8 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++DBFB CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++DBFE 3A 33 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++DC01 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++DC02 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++DC04 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++DC05 32 3C C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++DC08 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++DC09 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++DC0B C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++DC0C FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++DC0E 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++DC10 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++DC11 32 3D C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++DC14 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++DC15 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++DC16 32 33 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++DC19 21 1B C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++DC1C 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++DC1F 21 15 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++DC22 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++DC25 CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++DC28 21 1D C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++DC2B 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  55++DC2E 21 17 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  56++DC31 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  57++DC34 CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  58++DC37 21 1F C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  59++DC3A 22 F8 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  60++DC3D 21 19 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  61++DC40 22 FA 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  62++DC43 CD C3 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  63++DC46 C9                                   ret
  64++DC47
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1337+ DC47                          INCLUDE "./ModelRender/DrawLines.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
   1++DC47
   2++DC47              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++DC47 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   4++DC48              ; Initial tests look OK
   5++DC48              LL155:;
   6++DC48              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   7++DC48                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:
   8++DC48 3E 65        DrawLines:              ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
   9++DC4A FD 6F                                ld		iyl,a							; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
  10++DC4C 3A 00 C3                             ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  11++DC4F                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   						; No lines then bail out.
  11++DC4F A7          >                        and     a
  11++DC50 C8          >                        ret     z
  12++DC51 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw
  13++DC53 21 0E C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  14++DC56              ;LL27:                                       ; counter Y, Draw clipped lines in XX19 ship lines heap
  15++DC56 4E           DrawXX19ClippedLines:   ld      c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  16++DC57 23                                   inc     hl
  17++DC58 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  18++DC59 23                                   inc     hl
  19++DC5A              ;;DEBUGTEST        push bc
  20++DC5A              ;;DEBUGTEST        push hl
  21++DC5A              ;;DEBUGTEST        push de
  22++DC5A              ;;DEBUGTEST        ld  a,$3F

  31++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       push bc
  32++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       push hl

  34++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       push de

  36++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       ld  a,$3F
  37++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       MMUSelectLayer2
  38++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       call    l2_plot_pixel
  39++DC5D              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop de

  42++DC5D 23                                   inc     hl

1340+ DC74              ; DIot seem to lawyas have Y = 0???
1341+ DC74              ProcessDot:            ; break
1342+ DC74 CD 52 CF                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1343+ DC77 CD A1 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1344+ DC7A CD 08 D2                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1345+ DC7D CD D5 D0                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1346+ DC80 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
1347+ DC83 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
1348+ DC86 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
1349+ DC89 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
1350+ DC8C AF                                   xor     a
1351+ DC8D CD C7 8F                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1352+ DC90 CD 89 CF                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1353+ DC93 CD 06 D0                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1354+ DC96 FD 21 CE C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1355+ DC9A CD BC D8                             call    ProjectNodeToEye
1356+ DC9D C9                                   ret
1357+ DC9E
1358+ DC9E              ; .....................................................
1359+ DC9E              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1360+ DC9E              ; for each node:
1361+ DC9E              ;     see if node >
1362+ DC9E 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1363+ DC9F 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1364+ DCA1 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1365+ DCA3 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1366+ DCA4              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1366+ DCA4 AF          >                        xor a
1367+ DCA5 32 00 C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1368+ DCA8 CD 52 CF                             call CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1369+ DCAB CD A1 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1370+ DCAE CD 08 D2                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1371+ DCB1 CD D5 D0                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1372+ DCB4 21 25 C3                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1373+ DCB7 3A 14 C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#8 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1374+ DCBA 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1375+ DCBB 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1376+ DCBC 16 06                                ld      d,6
1377+ DCBE CD 58 AA                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1378+ DCC1 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1379+ DCC2 FD 21 CE C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1380+ DCC6              LL48:
1381+ DCC6 C5           PointLoop:	            push	bc                                  ; save counters
1382+ DCC7 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1383+ DCC8 FD E5                                push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1384+ DCCA 78                                   ld      a,b
1385+ DCCB                                      ;break
1386+ DCCB CD 39 D8                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1387+ DCCE 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1388+ DCD1 CD C7 8F                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1389+ DCD4 CD 89 CF                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1390+ DCD7 CD 06 D0                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1391+ DCDA FD E1                                pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1392+ DCDC CD BC D8                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1393+ DCDF                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1394+ DCDF                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1395+ DCDF FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1396+ DCE1 E1                                   pop		hl
1397+ DCE2 3E 04                                ld		a,4
1398+ DCE4 ED 31                                add		hl,a
1399+ DCE6 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1400+ DCE7 FD E1                                pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1401+ DCE9 E1                                   pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1402+ DCEA 3E 06                                ld		a,6
1403+ DCEC ED 31                                add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1404+ DCEE C1                                   pop		bc                                  ; get counter back
1405+ DCEF 10 D5                                djnz	PointLoop
1406+ DCF1              ; ......................................................
1407+ DCF1                                      ClearCarryFlag
1407+ DCF1 B7          >                        or a
1408+ DCF2 C9                                   ret
1409+ DCF3
1410+ DCF3              ; ......................................................
1411+ DCF3 CD B6 D4     ProcessShip:            call    CheckDistance               ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum
1412+ DCF6 D8                                   ret     c                           ; carry flag means drop out
1413+ DCF7 3A 9C C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnKDrawAsDot)           ; if its just a dot then don't draw
1414+ DCFA                                      JumpIfATrue .CarryOnWithDraw
1414+ DCFA A7          >                        and     a
1414+ DCFB CA 1E DD    >                        jp      z, .CarryOnWithDraw
1415+ DCFE CD 74 DC     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1416+ DD01 ED 4B CE C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1417+ DD05 ED 5B D0 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1418+ DD09 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1419+ DD0A B2                                   or      d                           ;
1420+ DD0B C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1421+ DD0C 7B                                   ld      a,e
1422+ DD0D E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1423+ DD0F C0                                   ret     nz
1424+ DD10 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1425+ DD11 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1426+ DD13 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1427+ DD15                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1427+ DD15 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1428+ DD19 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel               ;
1429+ DD1C                                      ClearCarryFlag
1429+ DD1C B7          >                        or a
1430+ DD1D C9                                   ret
1431+ DD1E              .CarryOnWithDraw:       ;break
1432+ DD1E              ;DEBUG                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; if its exploding then we just draw
1433+ DD1E              ;DEBUG                        and     ShipExploding               ; clouds of pixels
1434+ DD1E              ;DEBUG                        jr      nz,.ExplodingCloud          ; .
1435+ DD1E CD A4 DC                             call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1436+ DD21 CD 04 D5                             call    CullV2
1437+ DD24 CD B3 DD                             call    PrepLines
1438+ DD27 CD 48 DC                             call    DrawLines
1439+ DD2A                                      ClearCarryFlag
1439+ DD2A B7          >                        or a
1440+ DD2B C9                                   ret
1441+ DD2C DD 01        .ExplodingCloud:        break
1442+ DD2E C9                                   ret
1443+ DD2F              ; ......................................................
1444+ DD2F
1445+ DD2F              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1446+ DD2F              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1447+ DD2F              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1448+ DD2F              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1449+ DD2F              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1450+ DD2F              ;
1451+ DD2F              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1452+ DD2F              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1453+ DD2F              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1454+ DD2F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1455+ DD2F              AddLaserBeamLine:
1456+ DD2F              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1457+ DD2F              GetGunVertexNode:
1458+ DD2F 3A 12 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1459+ DD32 21 CE C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1460+ DD35 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1461+ DD37 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1462+ DD3A              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1463+ DD3A 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1464+ DD3B 23                   inc         hl
1465+ DD3C 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1466+ DD3D 23                   inc         hl
1467+ DD3E ED 43 83 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1468+ DD42 0C                   inc         c
1469+ DD43 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1470+ DD44 04                   inc         b
1471+ DD45 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1472+ DD46              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1473+ DD46 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1474+ DD47 23                   inc         hl
1475+ DD48 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1476+ DD49 23                   inc         hl
1477+ DD4A ED 43 85 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1478+ DD4E              SetX2PointToXX15:
1479+ DD4E 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1480+ DD51 ED 43 87 C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1481+ DD55 3A 12 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1482+ DD58 4F                   ld          c,a
1483+ DD59              SetY2PointToXX15:
1484+ DD59 ED 43 89 C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1485+ DD5D 3A 0E C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1486+ DD60                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1486+ DD60 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1486+ DD62 CA 6A DD    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1487+ DD65              LL74DecX2:
1488+ DD65 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1489+ DD67 32 87 C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1490+ DD6A              LL74SkipDec:
1491+ DD6A CD FC CC             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1492+ DD6D 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1493+ DD6F              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1494+ DD6F 2A 19 98             ld          hl,(varU16)
1495+ DD72 3A 83 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1496+ DD75 77                   ld          (hl),a
1497+ DD76 23                   inc         hl
1498+ DD77 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1499+ DD7A 77                   ld          (hl),a
1500+ DD7B 23                   inc         hl
1501+ DD7C 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1502+ DD7F 77                   ld          (hl),a
1503+ DD80 23                   inc         hl
1504+ DD81 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1505+ DD84 77                   ld          (hl),a
1506+ DD85 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1507+ DD87 23                   inc         hl
1508+ DD88 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1509+ DD8A 22 19 98             ld          (varU16),hl
1510+ DD8D C9                   ret
1511+ DD8E
1512+ DD8E                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
   1++DD8E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD8E                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DD8E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD8E              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DD8E 21 CE C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DD91 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DD93 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DD94 11 83 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DD97 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DD99 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DD9B ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DD9D ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DD9F C9                                   ret
  12++DDA0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   3++DDA0                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DDA0              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DDA0              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DDA0 21 CE C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DDA3 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DDA5 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DDA6 11 87 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DDA9 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DDAB ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DDAD ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DDAF ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DDB1 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   4++DDB2                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DDB2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DDB2              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DDB2 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DDB2 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DDB2 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DDB2                                  ENDM
   7++DDB2
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DDB2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DDB2              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DDB2               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DDB2 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DDB3
  10++DDB3              PrepLines:
  11++DDB3              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DDB3
  13++DDB3              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DDB3              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DDB3              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DDB3              ;        or          8
  17++DDB3              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DDB3              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DDB3              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DDB3              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DDB3              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DDB3              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DDB3              ;
  24++DDB3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DDB3              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DDB3                      ;break
  27++DDB3                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DDB3 AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DDB4 32 00 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DDB7                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DDB7 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DDB8 32 01 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DDBB                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DDBB AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DDBC 32 B2 DD    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DDBF 3A 15 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DDC2 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DDC4 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DDC7 21 0E C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DDCA 22 19 98             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DDCD                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DDCD 3A 15 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DDD0 32 1D 98    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DDD3 3A 35 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DDD6                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DDD6 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DDD8 CA E0 DD    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DDDB E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DDDD 32 35 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DDE0              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DDE0              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DDE0              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DDE0              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DDE0              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DDE0 21 51 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DDE3                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DDE3 22 14 97             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DDE6 3A 11 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DDE9 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DDEA              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DDEA              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DDEA 2A 14 97             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DDED E5                   push        hl
  54++DDEE FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DDF0                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DDF0 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DDF0                      ENDIF
  58++DDF0 3A 04 97             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DDF3 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DDF4              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DDF4 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DDF7                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DDF7 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DDF8 DA 4B DE    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DDFB              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DDFB              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DDFB              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DDFB FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DDFE 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DDFF E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DE01                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DE01 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DE04 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DE06 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DE07              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DE07                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DE07 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  71++DE09 C2 1D DE    >                        jp	nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DE0C              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DE0C 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DE0D ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DE0F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DE11 E5                   push        hl
  77++DE12                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DE12 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DE15 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DE17 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DE18 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DE19                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DE19 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DE1A CA 4B DE    >                        jp	z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DE1D              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DE1D              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DE1D              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DE1D FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DE20 CD 8E DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DE23 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DE26 CD A0 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DE29 CD FC CC             call        ClipLine
  88++DE2C 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DE2E              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DE2E ED 5B 19 98          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DE32 21 83 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DE35                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DE35 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE37 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE39 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE3B ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DE3D ED 53 19 98          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DE41 21 00 C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DE44 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DE45 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DE46                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DE46 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DE48 D2 61 DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DE4B              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DE4B              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DE4B              LL78:
 101++DE4B 2A 14 97             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DE4E 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DE50 ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DE52 22 14 97             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DE55 21 B2 DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DE58 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DE59 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DE5A                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DE5A 21 1D 98    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DE5D BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DE5E C2 EA DD    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DE61              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DE61              LL81:
 111++DE61              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DE61 3A 00 C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DE64 CB 27                sla         a
 114++DE66 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DE68 32 01 C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DE6B              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DE6B C9                   ret
 118++DE6C
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

 340+ F4D5              ;Each row is 7 bytes
 341+ F4D5              ;                                                               12345  6  789012345678901
 342+ F4D5              ;	canbuy;
 343+ F4D5              ;	y;
 344+ F4D5              ;	show;
 345+ F4D5              ;	level;
 346+ F4D5              ;	price 2 bytes;
 347+ F4D5              ;	type;
 348+ F4D5              ;ShipFrontWeapons        DB EQ_FRONT_PULSE,  EQ_FRONT_PULSE,     EQ_FRONT_MINING,    EQ_FRONT_MINING
 349+ F4D5              ;ShipRearWeapons         DB EQ_REAR_PULSE,   EQ_REAR_PULSE,      EQ_REAR_MINING,     EQ_REAR_MINING
 350+ F4D5              ;ShipLeftWeapons         DB EQ_LEFT_PULSE,   EQ_LEFT_PULSE,      EQ_LEFT_MINING,     EQ_LEFT_MINING
 351+ F4D5              ;ShipRightWeapons        DB EQ_RIGHT_PULSE,  EQ_RIGHT_PULSE,     EQ_RIGHT_MINING,    EQ_RIGHT_MINING
 352+ F4D5              ;                           c  y  s  t
 353+ F4D5              ;                           a  p  h  e                                            fi     P
 354+ F4D5              ;                           n  o  o  c                                            tt     o
 355+ F4D5              ;                           B  s  w  h  price                  type               ed     s

 382+ F675              ShipEquipTableRowLen    EQU 16
 383+ F675              ShipEquipTableSize      EQU ($-ShipEquipmentList)/ShipEquipTableRowLen
 384+ F675
 385+ F675              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 386+ F675 2B           GalaxyRandSeed			DB	43	            ; Just some start values
 387+ F676 20           GalaxyRandSeed1			DB	32	            ; Just some start values
 388+ F677 0C           GalaxyRandSeed2			DB	12	            ; Just some start values
 389+ F678 42           GalaxyRandSeed3			DB	66	            ; Just some start values
 390+ F679              GalaxySeedRandom:
 391+ F679              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 392+ F679 CD FD 9C     GetDigramGalaxySeed:    call	copy_galaxy_to_working
 393+ F67C 18 03                                jr		GetDigramWorkingSeed
 394+ F67E CD 15 9D     GetDigramSystemSeed:    call	copy_system_to_working
 395+ F681 11 13 A5     GetDigramWorkingSeed:   ld		de,name_expanded    ; ">GetDigram a = digram seed"
 396+ F684 06 03                                ld		b,3
 397+ F686 3A 05 99                             ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)
 398+ F689 E6 40                                and		$40
 399+ F68B 28 03                                jr		z,.SmallSizeName
 400+ F68D CD 34 A5     .LargeSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 401+ F690 CD 34 A5     .SmallSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 402+ F693 CD 34 A5                             call	NamingLoop
 403+ F696 CD 34 A5                             call	NamingLoop
 404+ F699 EB           .DoneName:              ex		de,hl
 405+ F69A 36 00                                ld		(hl),0
 406+ F69C EB                                   ex		de,hl
 407+ F69D C9                                   ret
 408+ F69E
 409+ F69E 11 75 F6     GalaxySetSeedFromHL:    ld      de,GalaxyRandSeed
 410+ F6A1              ; Uses registers a,b and hl
 411+ F6A1 B7           GalaxyDoRandom:         or      a                                               ; in 6502 this is called after a bcc instruction to will always be clear (see .detok2 and .dt6)
 412+ F6A2 3A 75 F6                             ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed)
 413+ F6A5 CB 17        .Seed0Rolled:           rl      a                                               ; r0 << 1
 414+ F6A7 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = reg x in 6502 so x = r0 << 1
 415+ F6A8 21 77 F6     .AddSeed2               ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed2                              ;
 416+ F6AB 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; a = r0 << 1 + r2
 417+ F6AC 32 75 F6     .SetRandSeed0:          ld		(GalaxyRandSeed),a					            ; set r0' = (r0 << 1) +  r2 + (r0 bit 7)
 418+ F6AF 78                                   ld      a,b
 419+ F6B0 32 77 F6     .SetRandSeed2:          ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; set r2' =  r0 << 1
 420+ F6B3 3A 76 F6     .GetRandSeed1:          ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed1)
 421+ F6B6 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = r1
 422+ F6B7 21 78 F6                             ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed3
 423+ F6BA 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; Adc from before may have set carry flag or may not, will be set if r0 << 1 + r2 + carry > 256
 424+ F6BB 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; set r1' = r1 + r3 + carry
 425+ F6BE 4F                                   ld      c,a
 426+ F6BF 78                                   ld      a,b
 427+ F6C0 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; set r3 = r1
 428+ F6C3 79                                   ld      a,c
 429+ F6C4 C9                                   ret
 430+ F6C5
 431+ F6C5              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 432+ F6C5 ED 31        galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de:add     hl,a
 433+ F6C7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 434+ F6C9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch low byte
 435+ F6CA 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ F6CB 23                                   inc     hl
 437+ F6CC 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch high byte
 438+ F6CD 68                                   ld      l,b
 439+ F6CE 67                                   ld      h,a
 440+ F6CF 7E           GalaxyCopyLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 441+ F6D0 FE 00                                cp      0
 442+ F6D2 C8                                   ret     z
 443+ F6D3 12                                   ld      (de),a
 444+ F6D4 23                                   inc     hl
 445+ F6D5 13                                   inc     de
 446+ F6D6 18 F7                                jr      GalaxyCopyLoop
 447+ F6D8              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 448+ F6D8 11 63 F1     galaxy_get_species:     ld      de,GalaxySpecies
 449+ F6DB 3E 28                                ld      a,"("
 450+ F6DD 12                                   ld      (de),a
 451+ F6DE 13                                   inc     de
 452+ F6DF 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+4)
 453+ F6E2 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 454+ F6E4 20 0A                                jr      nz,.NonHuman
 455+ F6E6 21 61 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantHumanIx
 456+ F6E9 AF                                   xor     a
 457+ F6EA CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 458+ F6ED C3 4B F7                             jp      .galaxy_species_exit
 459+ F6F0 3A FC E8     .NonHuman:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 460+ F6F3 CB 3F                                srl     a
 461+ F6F5 CB 3F                                srl     a
 462+ F6F7 E6 07                                and     $07
 463+ F6F9 FE 03                                cp      3
 464+ F6FB 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc1
 465+ F6FD 21 33 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc1Ix
 466+ F700 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 467+ F703 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 468+ F705 12                                   ld      (de),a
 469+ F706 13                                   inc     de
 470+ F707 3A FC E8     .NotDesc1:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 471+ F70A CB 3F                                srl     a
 472+ F70C CB 3F                                srl     a
 473+ F70E CB 3F                                srl     a
 474+ F710 CB 3F                                srl     a
 475+ F712 CB 3F                                srl     a
 476+ F714 FE 06                                cp      6
 477+ F716 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc2
 478+ F718 21 39 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc2Ix
 479+ F71B CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 480+ F71E 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 481+ F720 12                                   ld      (de),a
 482+ F721 13                                   inc     de
 483+ F722 3A F8 E8     .NotDesc2:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 484+ F725 47                                   ld      b,a
 485+ F726 3A FA E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 486+ F729 A8                                   xor     b
 487+ F72A E6 07                                and     $07
 488+ F72C F5                                   push    af
 489+ F72D FE 06                                cp      6
 490+ F72F 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc3
 491+ F731 21 45 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc3Ix
 492+ F734 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 493+ F737 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 494+ F739 12                                   ld      (de),a
 495+ F73A 13                                   inc     de
 496+ F73B F1           .NotDesc3:              pop     af
 497+ F73C 47                                   ld      b,a
 498+ F73D 3A FC E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 499+ F740 E6 03                                and     $03
 500+ F742 80                                   add     a,b
 501+ F743 E6 07                                and     $07
 502+ F745 21 51 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc4Ix
 503+ F748 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 504+ F74B 3E 73        .galaxy_species_exit:   ld      a,"s"
 505+ F74D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 506+ F74E 13                                   inc     de
 507+ F74F 3E 29                                ld      a,")"
 508+ F751 12                                   ld      (de),a
 509+ F752 13                                   inc     de
 510+ F753 AF                                   xor     a
 511+ F754 12                                   ld      (de),a
 512+ F755 C9                                   ret
 513+ F756
 514+ F756
 515+ F756              ; To copy seed, loops from 3 to 0
 516+ F756              ; copy seed X + 2 to target X
 517+ F756              ; x = x -1
 518+ F756
 519+ F756              ; For lave we shoudl have "Lave is most famous for its vast rain forests and the Lavian tree grub"
 520+ F756
 521+ F756              GalaxyCapitaliseString: ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 522+ F756 23                                   inc		hl
 523+ F757 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 524+ F758 FE 00                                cp		0
 525+ F75A C8                                   ret		z
 526+ F75B FE 5B                                cp		'Z'+1
 527+ F75D 30 F7                                jr		nc,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 528+ F75F FE 41                                cp		'A'
 529+ F761 38 F3                                jr		c,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 530+ F763 C6 20        .LowerCase:             add		a,'a'-'A'
 531+ F765 77                                   ld		(hl),a
 532+ F766 18 EE                                jr		GalaxyCapitaliseString
